translation.en: [woman] Come on, can't you go any faster?
translation.zh: 快点 你能再快一点吗？

translation.en: [man] Kate, FDNY says six people are trapped in the fire. Are you there yet?
translation.zh: 凯特 纽约消防局表示有六人被困在火场内 你到了吗？

translation.en: [Kate] Yeah, almost. Go, go, go. Park right there.
translation.zh: 快到了 快点 停在那边

translation.en: [man 2] Yeah, yeah. I see it, I see it.
translation.zh: 知道了 我看见了

translation.en: [man 1] Coming to you live in five minutes.
translation.zh: 五分钟后转播现场情况

translation.en: -[Kate] Okay, we'll be ready. -[man 2] We've got this.
translation.zh: -知道了 到时准备好-交给我们吧

translation.en: [man 1] Four engines on the scene. More on the way.
translation.zh: 现场有四辆 其他正在赶来

translation.en: -Got feet on the ground yet? -Yeah, we just got here.
translation.zh: 你们抵达现场了吗？ 我们刚抵达现场

translation.en: [man 1] Get some cutaways. We'll do a stand-up on the third block.
translation.zh: 给我几个旁跳镜头我们在第三条街做直击报道

translation.en: No, David, it's no good.
translation.zh: 大卫 大事不妙

translation.en: The police have the media at least 50 yards out.
translation.zh: 警方把媒体限制在距离火场45米以外的地方

translation.en: I'm gonna get us something exclusive.
translation.zh: 我想争取一些独家报道

translation.en: -How are you gonna do that? -You know the drill. Give me the camera.
translation.zh: -你打算怎么做？-老招数 你懂的 摄影机给我

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -Hey. -Sir, please stay away from the barricade.
translation.zh: -你好-先生 请别越过封锁线

translation.en: I just had a quick question. Do you know how this-- Oh.
translation.zh: 我只是有一个简单的问题 你知道…

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Sorry about that, man.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: All thumbs today.
translation.zh: 今天笨手笨脚的

translation.en: [fireman 1] Need a ladder, south side. South side!
translation.zh: 南边需要一个梯子

translation.en: [fireman 2] Get Charlie up on the second floor.
translation.zh: 第三组到二楼

translation.en: [fireman 3] Need more pressure here.
translation.zh: 这边需要增加水压

translation.en: [fireman 4] Open it up. We need more pressure on this one.
translation.zh: 扭开这个消防栓 这个需要增加水压

translation.en: [fireman 5] They're EMT, let 'em through. Come on, guys. We gotta move here.
translation.zh: 让紧急医疗技术员进来 这边的人行动快点

translation.en: [woman] Come on, guys.
translation.zh: 加油

translation.en: [fireman 1] Block that window out. Block that window.
translation.zh: 赶紧封住那扇窗

translation.en: [fireman 2] Give me a hand here.
translation.zh: 我需要帮忙

translation.en: [fireman] Hey! You gotta get out of here now. This fire's out of control.
translation.zh: 请你马上离开 火势失控了

translation.en: It's okay, I've done this before.
translation.zh: 没事的 这种场合我见过

translation.en: Not like this, you haven't.
translation.zh: 这一回不同

translation.en: Look out!
translation.zh: 小心

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: You should get out now.
translation.zh: 请你马上离开

translation.en: [woman] It's very hard to get any real...
translation.zh: 很难拍到真实的…

translation.en: [David] Ten seconds, Kate.
translation.zh: 凯特 倒数十秒

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, copy that. I'll be ready.
translation.zh: 知道了 收到 马上准备好

translation.en: [man] Just make sure you get that. Good.
translation.zh: 确保一切准备就绪 行了

translation.en: In five, four, three...
translation.zh: 五、四、三…

translation.en: Channel 12 News has obtained exclusive footage
translation.zh: 第12新闻频道取得了独家现场画面

translation.en: of firefighters battling the blaze at this abandoned warehouse in Brooklyn.
translation.zh: 画面中可见消防员在布鲁克林一间荒废的仓库里与火魔搏斗

translation.en: New York City's finest at the FDNY have already pulled out eight people from the inferno.
translation.zh: 纽约消防局的精兵强将成功在火海中救出八人

translation.en: And the operation continues.
translation.zh: 拯救行动仍在进行中

translation.en: From Brooklyn, I'm Kate Bradley, Channel 12 News.
translation.zh: 我是第12新闻频道的凯特布莱德利在布鲁克林为您做现场报道

translation.en: Wow. None of the other stations have anything like that.
translation.zh: 天啊 其他电视台可没拍到这些情景

translation.en: Nice footage, Josh.
translation.zh: 乔什 拍得好

translation.en: Don't look at me. It was all Kate.
translation.zh: 别看我 都是凯特的功劳

translation.en: Ooh, and it's getting a ton of views on our website.
translation.zh: 网站涌入大量的读者

translation.en: Nice.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: Kate, I just got off the phone with our legal department.
translation.zh: 凯特 我刚接到法律部门打来的电话

translation.en: Wanna guess what they said about your report from the scene?
translation.zh: 你猜他们怎么看你的火场报道？

translation.en: Bravo?
translation.zh: 好样的 干得好？

translation.en: -Good job? -Try reckless and dangerous.
translation.zh: 好样的 干得好？ 鲁莽行事 罔顾性命保险不会针对这种特技做出赔偿

translation.en: Our insurance doesn't cover stunts like that.
translation.zh: 鲁莽行事 罔顾性命保险不会针对这种特技做出赔偿

translation.en: Stunts? I mean, I call that being a reporter.
translation.zh: 特技？我认为这是记者该做的事

translation.en: It's got to stop.
translation.zh: 适可而止

translation.en: Well, they didn't seem to mind when I got them that exclusive coverage
translation.zh: 但他们似乎不介意我闯入那家位于布朗克斯区

translation.en: from inside the collapsed factory in the Bronx.
translation.zh: 摇摇欲坠的工厂 拍到那些独家画面

translation.en: No, no, you see, actually, I did mind.
translation.zh: 听好 我介意

translation.en: Station management are going nuts with all the risks you're taking.
translation.zh: 你总是以身犯险台领导此举感到十分愤怒

translation.en: [scoffs] Well, they seem to like the ratings. Knock it off, Kate. You hear me?
translation.zh: -但他们似乎对收视率十分满意-够了 凯特 听清楚了吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, loud and clear, boss. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -收到了 老大 一清二楚-谢谢

translation.en: -[Kate] So you said 12 people rescued? -[phone beeps]
translation.zh: 你是说救出12人？

translation.en: Can I call you back? Thanks.
translation.zh: 我可以待会儿再打给你吗？谢谢

translation.en: Hi, Dad. I saw your text, but I--
translation.zh: 爸 我看见你的短信了 只是…

translation.en: [man] I saw your report from the warehouse fire. I was worried.
translation.zh: 我看见你在火场做的报道我很担心你

translation.en: It's not like you to ignore my texts.
translation.zh: 你故意不回复我的短信

translation.en: I'm not ignoring you, Dad.
translation.zh: 爸 我没有故意不回复你的短信

translation.en: It's been a busy day, and I just got the fire investigator on the phone--
translation.zh: 今天太忙了我刚跟火灾调查员通过电话

translation.en: It's midnight and you're still working?
translation.zh: -我…-半夜三更 你还在工作？

translation.en: [Kate] Dad, I know you're calling me from the office.
translation.zh: 爸 我知道你是从办公室打来的

translation.en: Well, that's different. A senator's work is never done.
translation.zh: 我的情况不同参议员的工作是没完没了的

translation.en: You know, I wish you'd consider reporting on politics instead of chasing fires and car crashes.
translation.zh: 我真希望你能报道政治新闻而不是追踪火灾或车祸

translation.en: It'd be a lot safer.
translation.zh: 这样比较安全

translation.en: Safer, sure, but not nearly as exciting.
translation.zh: 是比较安全 但不够刺激

translation.en: At least say you'll join me for this fundraiser tomorrow.
translation.zh: 至少可以陪我出席明天举办的筹款活动吧？

translation.en: Do you really need me there? You know I don't like political events.
translation.zh: 真的需要我在场吗？你明知道我不喜欢出席政治活动

translation.en: Yes, but I also know you love me.
translation.zh: 但我也知道你是爱我的

translation.en: Come on, do your dad a favor.
translation.zh: 别这样 帮爸爸一个忙

translation.en: The donors love you. Besides, I haven't seen your face in ages.
translation.zh: 那些捐款人都很喜欢你再说 我们已经很久没见面了

translation.en: -Dad, we FaceTimed yesterday. -Doesn't count.
translation.zh: -爸 我们昨天才通过视频聊天-不算见面

translation.en: All right, all right. I will see you at the fundraiser.
translation.zh: 好吧 明天筹款活动上见

translation.en: Now get out of the office and stop worrying about me.
translation.zh: 请你赶紧离开办公室 别再担心我了

translation.en: -Okay. Good night. -Good night.
translation.zh: -听你的 晚安-晚安

translation.en: Right off the top, we've got Susan's interview with the mayor.
translation.zh: 首要事项 苏珊访问市长

translation.en: You good to go?
translation.zh: 你可以出发了

translation.en: His Honorable has pushed it to 3:00 p.m., but I'll be ready.
translation.zh: 市长先生把访问延后至下午3点我会随时待命

translation.en: Good. Keep digging. Get the story first.
translation.zh: 很好 继续挖掘新闻中的新闻

translation.en: Alex, welcome.
translation.zh: 艾利克斯 欢迎你

translation.en: Hi, sorry. Train delay.
translation.zh: 不好意思 火车延误了

translation.en: Next, we've got a bomb scare at Newark Liberty.
translation.zh: 纽瓦克自由国际机场接获炸弹恐吓

translation.en: -Ed, I want you on this one. -Already there.
translation.zh: -艾德 这则新闻你负责-没问题

translation.en: David, I covered that train derailment last March.
translation.zh: 大卫 去年3月火车出轨的新闻是我负责的

translation.en: I stayed in contact with some of my sources at the Department of Transpo.
translation.zh: 我一直和交通部的人保持联系

translation.en: -Send them to Ed if you think they'd help. -Great.
translation.zh: -如果用得上 就交给艾德吧-太好了

translation.en: I was thinking this could be my assignment.
translation.zh: 我认为应该由我负责这个案子

translation.en: Forget about it, Kate. Actually, this one's for you.
translation.zh: -凯特 你休想-其实我已经为你准备了一个案子

translation.en: There was a call from a woman in the South Bronx
translation.zh: 有个布朗克斯南部的女人打来电视台

translation.en: saying she found a bag on her porch.
translation.zh: 说她在家门前发现一个袋子

translation.en: She found a bag? Why aren't we going live to air with this thing right now?
translation.zh: 发现一个袋子？这也值得大肆报道吗？

translation.en: -The bag was full of cash. -Hm. Who does she think it belongs to?
translation.zh: -包里全是钞票-她认为那些钱是谁的？

translation.en: She's convinced it was given to her by a Good Samaritan.
translation.zh: 她相信是一个好心的撒马利亚人送给她的

translation.en: -Aww. -Sounds like a sweet story.
translation.zh: 听起来像个温馨的故事

translation.en: You now, this could be a home run for Lauren.
translation.zh: 这则报道搞不好可以让劳伦一蹴而就

translation.en: She's great on soft news. No offense.
translation.zh: 她擅长写软性新闻 我无意冒犯

translation.en: -It's what I do. -Lauren's on Ribfest.
translation.zh: -确实如此-劳伦在处理排骨节的报道

translation.en: Okay. Well, I can follow up on the warehouse fire.
translation.zh: 我不介意跟进仓库着火的报道

translation.en: The fire's out. There's nothing to follow up on.
translation.zh: 火已经扑灭了 没什么好跟进的

translation.en: That's it, people. Get out of here. Go find some news.
translation.zh: 会议结束 都给我滚出去找新闻

translation.en: David, what are you not telling me?
translation.zh: 大卫 你怎么之前不告诉我？

translation.en: Execs don't want you on any story that might explode,
translation.zh: 高层不希望你处理任何有爆破

translation.en: implode, burst into flames, or otherwise end up in an insurance claim.
translation.zh: 内爆、起火燃烧元素的报道免得需要保险赔付

translation.en: Consider this a break from the bummer beat.
translation.zh: 你就暂时不处理灾难和意外新闻

translation.en: For how long?
translation.zh: “暂时”是多久？

translation.en: We'll see. For now, you're on the Good Samaritan.
translation.zh: 看情况吧你暂时处理“好撒马利亚人”的新闻

translation.en: [Kate] It's barely news.
translation.zh: 这根本不算什么新闻

translation.en: A woman finds a bag of money. I mean, what's next?
translation.zh: 一个女人发现一个装满钞票的袋子接着还有什么新闻？

translation.en: A charity car wash? Parent-teacher conference?
translation.zh: 慈善洗车活动？家长见面会？

translation.en: David's not gonna keep you on local interest for long.
translation.zh: 大卫不会让你一直处理地方新闻的

translation.en: -You're one of his best reporters. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -你是电视台最出色的记者-多谢赞赏

translation.en: But still, I mean, where's the story?
translation.zh: 可是这起事件有什么新闻价值？

translation.en: What? You don't buy the Good Samaritan angle?
translation.zh: 怎么？你不相信有好撒马利亚人？

translation.en: I remain objective always. But no.
translation.zh: 我对任何事件都保持中立但我确实不信这套

translation.en: [woman] Over here!
translation.zh: 在这边

translation.en: [Kate] There she is. Hi.
translation.zh: 她在那边 你好

translation.en: You ready?
translation.zh: 你准备好了吗？

translation.en: Please, come this way.
translation.zh: 请往这边走来

translation.en: I will let you in.
translation.zh: 我开门让你们进来

translation.en: It came in this bag, just like this.
translation.zh: 钱就装在这个袋子里
十万美元
十万美元

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: And, now, does this mean anything to you?
translation.zh: 你知道这个符号有什么意义吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不知道

translation.en: But I know there is someone out there looking over and helping us.
translation.zh: 可是我知道有一个人一直在照顾和帮助我们

translation.en: This has been a very hard time.
translation.zh: 我们一家人都过得十分艰苦

translation.en: My husband was laid off last winter.
translation.zh: 我丈夫去年冬天失业

translation.en: After that, we were evicted and...
translation.zh: 之后我们被屋主逐出住所

translation.en: we moved here.
translation.zh: 然后搬来这里

translation.en: Did it come with a note? Anything?
translation.zh: 袋子里有没有纸条之类的东西？

translation.en: No note.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: But I know why it happened.
translation.zh: 但我知道是怎么回事

translation.en: A miracle.
translation.zh: -你是指奇迹吧？-没错

translation.en: Si. This is why I called you here. I want everyone to know miracles happen.
translation.zh: 所以我才联络你们我要每个人知道奇迹是存在的

translation.en: You don't believe in miracles.
translation.zh: 你不相信奇迹？

translation.en: You cannot see everything with your eyes.
translation.zh: 有些事是肉眼看不到的

translation.en: Sometimes...
translation.zh: 有时候

translation.en: you have to look in here.
translation.zh: 你必须往内心去看

translation.en: You know, it may be feel-good filler, but it does the trick.
translation.zh: 这或许是个激励人心的软性新闻但观众不会买单

translation.en: Thanks. We should upload this segment, though. We go live in 20.
translation.zh: 我也认同 但也只能上传了20分钟后要播了

translation.en: You still think it's drug money, don't you?
translation.zh: 你依然觉得那是贩毒赃款吧？

translation.en: Or maybe a robbery. I don't know.
translation.zh: 也可能是贼赃 我也说不上来

translation.en: Look, I just think it's hard to believe that there's somebody out there doing good deeds and expecting nothing in return.
translation.zh: 我只是不太相信有人会做好事不求回报

translation.en: I don't know. That's kind of cynical.
translation.zh: 你未免太悲观了 好人好事时有所闻

translation.en: -I'm sure it happens all the time. -Oh, yeah?
translation.zh: 你未免太悲观了 好人好事时有所闻 是吗？我们合作了什么久

translation.en: Then why, in all of the time we've worked together,
translation.zh: 是吗？我们合作了什么久

translation.en: have we never reported a story like this?
translation.zh: 为什么不曾报道过类似的新闻？

translation.en: What about that guy last Christmas?
translation.zh: 记得去年圣诞节不是有个人在购物广场前的停车场

translation.en: The one that was fixing people's cars in mall parking lots when they broke down.
translation.zh: 记得去年圣诞节不是有个人在购物广场前的停车场 为人修理故障的汽车吗？

translation.en: That story never aired. You know why, right?
translation.zh: 那则新闻最后没有播出来你知道为什么吧？

translation.en: -Because he had that weird toupee? -What? No.
translation.zh: -因为他戴着一顶怪异的假发？-什么？不是

translation.en: Because the guy disabled the cars to begin with while the owners were shopping
translation.zh: 他趁别人去购物时故意弄坏他们的汽车

translation.en: and then offered to fix them for a small donation.
translation.zh: 然后自告奋勇地帮他们修车以换取少量的捐款

translation.en: -Seriously? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-对啊

translation.en: This number eight...
translation.zh: “8”这个数字

translation.en: maybe it's a marketing gimmick.
translation.zh: 可能是个营销噱头

translation.en: Do you remember that-- that, um, ride-share company
translation.zh: 你还记得那家拼车公司的驾驶员

translation.en: that handed out ten-dollar bills on Wall Street?
translation.zh: 在华尔街把十美元归还给乘客的新闻吗？

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 当然记得

translation.en: That campaign cost them a quarter million dollars.
translation.zh: 那项宣传活动耗资25万美元

translation.en: Okay, but that campaign reached 25,000 people.
translation.zh: 却帮助他们增加了两万五千位用户

translation.en: I mean, what company wants to so badly win over Christina Gomez?
translation.zh: 哪家公司急欲得到克里斯蒂娜戈麦斯的青睐？

translation.en: Okay, so maybe not that.
translation.zh: 或许不是同一回事

translation.en: All I'm saying is that whoever's behind this, they have a motive.
translation.zh: 我只想说这个送钱的人肯定有个动机

translation.en: I am certain change can happen because I am a product of it.
translation.zh: 我相信改变是有可能的事因为我就是改变的结果

translation.en: In 1951, my grandfather, Harish Banerjee,
translation.zh: 1951年 我的祖父哈利什巴纳杰

translation.en: moved his family and his engineering firm to New York City.
translation.zh: 将一家大小和他的电子工程公司迁到纽约市

translation.en: What was Banerjee Electronics in Calcutta
translation.zh: 当年位于加尔各答的巴纳杰电子工程公司

translation.en: became Bradley Electronics in Queens.
translation.zh: 如今成了皇后区的布莱德利电子工程公司

translation.en: Harish became Harry, but he remained the same man.
translation.zh: 哈利什也成了哈利但他依然是同一个人

translation.en: A man who came here not just to succeed, but to give back.
translation.zh: 这个人来到纽约市不仅是为了成功也是为了回馈社会

translation.en: In these uncertain times,
translation.zh: 在充满不确定的年代

translation.en: it is tempting to be cynical, to be fearful,
translation.zh: 我们很容易变得悲观 内心充满恐惧

translation.en: but together, -we can make change happen. -[applause]
translation.zh: 可是只要我们团结一心就能创造改变

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢大家

translation.en: Inspiring as always, Dad.
translation.zh: 爸 你依然懂得激励人心

translation.en: But you got dressed in the back of your car again, didn't you?
translation.zh: 你又在车后座换装了吧？

translation.en: -You don't miss a thing, do you? -Uh-uh.
translation.zh: 没什么事能瞒得过你

translation.en: Now, I want you to meet one of my donors. He's, uh-- he's been asking about you.
translation.zh: 我想让你会一会其中一个捐款人他一直想认识你

translation.en: Seen you on TV.
translation.zh: 他曾在电视上见过你

translation.en: Don't tell me. Uh, he probably wants me to do a story on his business.
translation.zh: 别告诉我他希望我报道他的企业

translation.en: He already has enough publicity.
translation.zh: 他已经不需要宣传了

translation.en: He was just named Investment Alliance fund manager of the year.
translation.zh: 他刚摘下“年度投资联盟基金经理”的美誉

translation.en: Oh, so it'll be an hour of me listening to him boasting about his financial success.
translation.zh: 那我就得花一个小时听他怎么吹擂自己的财富成就

translation.en: I don't know why I'd talk about my work when yours is so much more interesting.
translation.zh: 没必要聊我的工作毕竟你的工作比较有意思

translation.en: [clears throat] Kate, meet, uh, Jack Hansen.
translation.zh: 凯特 这位是杰克汉森

translation.en: Hi. Hi, Jack.
translation.zh: 你好 杰克

translation.en: Pleasure.
translation.zh: 幸会

translation.en: I guess this means now I need to ask you about what you do to prove I didn't prejudge you.
translation.zh: 看来为了避免我先入为主我得问清楚你到底是做什么的

translation.en: And I'll pretend to be flattered but steer the conversation back to what you do,
translation.zh: 那我会假装受宠若惊然后把话题转回到你的工作上

translation.en: like, uh, your report on the train derailment.
translation.zh: 例如你报道的那则火车出轨新闻

translation.en: I couldn't believe that you got that engineer to admit that he was texting and driving.
translation.zh: 你居然逼得那个工程师承认他在驾驶火车期间发短信

translation.en: Uh, well, he was not a bright man.
translation.zh: 他本来就不是个聪明人

translation.en: I knew you two would get along.
translation.zh: 我就知道你们会聊得来的

translation.en: Do you mind if I leave you in Kate's hands?
translation.zh: 介意我失陪一下吗？我让你和凯特聊聊

translation.en: Yeah, if it's all right with her.
translation.zh: 好啊 我不介意

translation.en: -Sure. -Thanks, Ashok.
translation.zh: -好啊-谢谢你 阿硕克

translation.en: Bye, Dad.
translation.zh: 再见 爸爸

translation.en: So should we pick out the best spot to watch the political ritual unfold?
translation.zh: 我们要不要选个合适的地点看看政治人物打交道的常态？

translation.en: Uh, for me, that would be the spot closest to the exit.
translation.zh: 在我看来 越靠近出口越好

translation.en: So no interest in politics?
translation.zh: 你对政治不感兴趣？

translation.en: Your dad wants you to move to Washington.
translation.zh: 你爸希望你搬去华盛顿

translation.en: Oh, I am well aware, but no.
translation.zh: 他的意思我非常清楚但我没这个打算

translation.en: No way am I leaving New York.
translation.zh: 我是不会离开纽约的

translation.en: And plus, covering politics is just not my thing.
translation.zh: 再说我对报道政治新闻不感兴趣

translation.en: Why not?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: Breaking news is more direct.
translation.zh: 突发新闻比较直接

translation.en: It's more honest. At least when people lie, or cheat, or steal...
translation.zh: 也比较真实 至少人们撒谎和偷鸡摸狗的事时不会隐隐藏藏

translation.en: ...they're doing it out in the open.
translation.zh: 至少人们撒谎和偷鸡摸狗的事时不会隐隐藏藏

translation.en: -No time to make up a soundbite, huh? -Exactly.
translation.zh: -他们没时间备稿-没错

translation.en: Oh, sorry. Uh...
translation.zh: 天啊 不好意思

translation.en: The station just sent me a lead on a story I'm working on.
translation.zh: 我在处理一则新闻电视台刚发了一个新情报给我

translation.en: I have to run.
translation.zh: 我该走了

translation.en: Okay, well, let's exchange numbers. We could do dinner sometime.
translation.zh: 那我们交换联络号码吧或许可以一起出来吃顿晚餐

translation.en: Um, I'm flattered, but I have a rule.
translation.zh: 我真是受宠若惊了可是我有一个原则

translation.en: I don't go out with anyone in my father's political circle.
translation.zh: 我从来不跟我父亲政治圈内的人约会

translation.en: Why so?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: When you are the daughter of a senator, you never know what people's motives are.
translation.zh: 我是参议员的女儿不知道靠近我的人有什么动机

translation.en: I like to think my motives are pretty clear.
translation.zh: 我倒认为我的动机非常明显

translation.en: Dinner.
translation.zh: 跟你吃顿晚餐

translation.en: Sala Cucina.
translation.zh: 萨拉意大利餐厅

translation.en: Oh, that's a good restaurant, but sorry, the answer's still no.
translation.zh: 那的确是一家不错的餐厅可是不好意思 我依然不能答应你 很高兴认识你

translation.en: It was really nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 我依然不能答应你 很高兴认识你

translation.en: -[sighs] -Hi, is this Marie Ellis?
translation.zh: 你好 你是玛丽埃利斯吗？

translation.en: [Marie] Yes.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: This is Kate Bradley with Channel 12 News. You called the station?
translation.zh: 我是来自第12新闻频道的凯特布莱德利 是你打给电视台吗？

translation.en: [Marie] I saw your report about the woman who found the cash on her doorstep.
translation.zh: 我看见你针对有个女人在门前发现一袋现金做的报道

translation.en: -I got the same thing. -Really? How much cash was it?
translation.zh: 这事也发生在我身上 真的？你得到多少钱？

translation.en: $100,000. In the bag with the tilted number eight.
translation.zh: 十万美元现金都装在一个写着“8”的袋子里

translation.en: Okay, where can I meet you?
translation.zh: 我们约在什么地方见面？

translation.en: I'll text you my address.
translation.zh: 我稍后把地址发给你

translation.en: But if you bring a camera, I won't open my door.
translation.zh: 但你不能带摄影机过来不然我不开门

translation.en: Got it. I'm on my way right now.
translation.zh: 知道了 我这就过去

translation.en: [Marie] It's real.
translation.zh: 都是真钞

translation.en: Not counterfeit.
translation.zh: 没有假钞

translation.en: I found it in front of our door this morning.
translation.zh: 我今天早上在门前发现这袋东西

translation.en: Same bag and everything.
translation.zh: 袋子和现金数额一摸一样

translation.en: I thought it might be stolen, so I took it to the police, but...
translation.zh: 我以为是赃款 所以交给警方

translation.en: they say it doesn't appear to be.
translation.zh: 结果警方说不是

translation.en: Who do you think could be behind this?
translation.zh: 你认为是谁做的？

translation.en: I don't know. I'm hoping you might tell me.
translation.zh: 我也不知道我本来以为你能告诉我的

translation.en: I'm sorry, I have no idea.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我也不知道

translation.en: Look, I know the woman you interviewed thinks it's a Good Samaritan.
translation.zh: 我知道你访问的那个女人认为这是“好撒马利亚人”的作为

translation.en: But we don't exactly need the help.
translation.zh: 但我们家不需要帮助

translation.en: I'm an oncologist at Parkland Hospital.
translation.zh: 我是帕克兰医院的肿瘤科医生

translation.en: So what are you planning on doing with the money?
translation.zh: 你打算怎么使用这笔钱？

translation.en: Pancreatic cancer research.
translation.zh: 捐给胰腺癌研究机构

translation.en: All of it?
translation.zh: 全数捐出去？

translation.en: It's an underfunded field. $100,000 will go a very long way.
translation.zh: 这个领域向来缺钱十万美元等于是一支强心剂

translation.en: And, sorry, why pancreatic cancer?
translation.zh: 为什么是胰腺癌？

translation.en: It takes people at a very young age, often before they even get started.
translation.zh: 多数患者年轻时候还未大展宏图就过世了

translation.en: It'll get a lot of years back. A lot of potential.
translation.zh: 这笔钱能为他们延长好多年的性命大有裨益

translation.en: This could make a really compelling story.
translation.zh: 这足以促成一个撼动人心的故事

translation.en: Would you consider letting me interview you on camera?
translation.zh: 你介意我在镜头前跟你做个访问吗？

translation.en: This could draw a lot of attention to this research that you're supporting.
translation.zh: 这么做能让更多人留意到你所支持的研究项目

translation.en: I like to keep my private life private,
translation.zh: 我希望能保持隐私

translation.en: but maybe you could mention the cause I'm donating to.
translation.zh: 不过你可以提到我捐款的原因

translation.en: Yeah, I'll, um...
translation.zh: 好的 我会…

translation.en: I'll do my best.
translation.zh: 我会尽力而为

translation.en: Police just issued a warrant on a string of hold-ups, those bodegas in Queens.
translation.zh: 警方刚针对一群抢劫杂货店的惯犯发出逮捕令

translation.en: -Ed, that's you. -Cool.
translation.zh: -艾德 你来负责-好极了

translation.en: News conference at ten to detail the manhunt.
translation.zh: 警方将在10点的记者会上发布追捕详情

translation.en: Got it.
translation.zh: 知道了

translation.en: Kate, thanks for coming. I've got a good one for you.
translation.zh: 凯特 你来了 好极了我有个好案子让你处理

translation.en: City Hall just yanked the permits on that new high-rise in SoHo.
translation.zh: 市政厅下令即时暂停苏豪区一幢高楼的建筑工程

translation.en: -What? -[man] They already broke ground.
translation.zh: -什么？-建筑工程已经开始了

translation.en: The whole block is a pit.
translation.zh: 整条街已经开了个大洞

translation.en: Well, something's going on. Kate, grab Josh and get me some footage.
translation.zh: 肯定有什么不对劲凯特 你和乔什一起去拍些画面回来

translation.en: Actually, I wanna stay on the Good Samaritan story.
translation.zh: 我想继续追踪“好撒马利亚人”的报道

translation.en: Yeah, that's funny.
translation.zh: 是啊 很好笑

translation.en: -Susan, I want you to-- -No, I'm serious.
translation.zh: -苏珊 我要你…-我是认真的

translation.en: A second woman called me last night.
translation.zh: 昨晚又有一个女人打来

translation.en: She also found a bag of money on her porch.
translation.zh: 她也在家门前发现一袋现金

translation.en: [Ed] A hundred grand?
translation.zh: 十万美元？

translation.en: Yeah. Same amount, same bag, same number eight on the bag.
translation.zh: 没错 现金数额和袋子一摸一样袋子上也写着同一个“8”

translation.en: -Does she know who it's from? -[Kate] No clue whatsoever.
translation.zh: 她知道是谁送来的吗？ 什么线索也没有

translation.en: And she doesn't even need the money.
translation.zh: 重点是她根本不需要那笔钱

translation.en: You guys, she's a doctor. She lives in a palace in Fort Greene.
translation.zh: 她是个医生住在格林堡的一座豪宅里

translation.en: She's donating it to cancer research.
translation.zh: -她打算把那笔钱捐给癌症研究机构-全数捐了？

translation.en: -All of it? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -没错-访问她了吗？

translation.en: She doesn't want to appear on camera.
translation.zh: 她不想上镜

translation.en: -She wants to remain anonymous. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 希望我们能对她的身份保密

translation.en: Come on! Two identical bags of cash? David, you don't think that's strange?
translation.zh: 这可是两袋数额相同的现金大卫 你不觉得不对劲吗？

translation.en: Yeah, but your second subject just clammed up
translation.zh: 可是你第二个受访者拒绝上镜

translation.en: and "something seems strange" is not news.
translation.zh: 再说“觉得不对劲”不足以构成新闻

translation.en: But there is a story here.
translation.zh: 我相信这事有新闻价值

translation.en: Maybe, but I can't go to air without some on-the-record information.
translation.zh: 或许你说得对可是我不能播出无凭无据的消息

translation.en: Kate...
translation.zh: 凯特

translation.en: Hi. We just received a phone call from a Jesse Durham on the Upper West Side.
translation.zh: 我们刚接到一通电话对方是来自上西区的杰西杜尔汉

translation.en: He said he found a bag of cash, just like in your report, and...
translation.zh: 他说他也发现了一袋现金就跟你报道中的一样

translation.en: he caught the guy on camera.
translation.zh: 闭路摄像头拍到了对方的身影

translation.en: He left the bag here, in front of my apartment door.
translation.zh: 他把袋子放在寓所门前

translation.en: Caught him on the security camera right here in the lobby.
translation.zh: 大厅的闭路摄像头拍到了他的身影

translation.en: $100,000 is a lot of money.
translation.zh: 十万美元不是小数目

translation.en: How will a gift like this change your life?
translation.zh: 这笔钱能为你的人生带来怎样的改变？

translation.en: A lot.
translation.zh: 很多

translation.en: I hurt my back a while ago. It laid me up for, like, three months.
translation.zh: 前阵子我的背部受伤了有三个月不能工作

translation.en: I'm back on my feet now, but it ate into my savings and then some.
translation.zh: 如今我已经振作起来了但是那场意外让我失去了存款

translation.en: Can you think of anyone that would have wanted to help?
translation.zh: 你觉得是谁会想帮助你呢？

translation.en: That's the thing. I never told anyone I needed the money.
translation.zh: 问题是我不曾把缺钱的事告诉任何人

translation.en: -[Kate] How do you plan to spend it? -I'm gonna pay off my debts,
translation.zh: -你打算怎么使用这笔钱？-付清我的债务

translation.en: build my savings back up to where they were before the accident,
translation.zh: 然后恢复意外发生前的存款数额

translation.en: and whatever's left, I'm... I'm gonna give to the food bank around the corner.
translation.zh: 至于剩下的钱我打算捐给附近的粮食银行机构

translation.en: They were a real help to me when... when things got tough.
translation.zh: 我穷困潦倒的时候是这些机构帮助我一把

translation.en: Will you leave it on their doorstep?
translation.zh: 你也会把钱放在门前吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] No, I think I'm gonna write them a check.
translation.zh: 不会 我打算开支票

translation.en: Security cameras at this Upper West Side building
translation.zh: 上西区某间公寓的闭路摄像头

translation.en: captured a glimpse of the mysterious donor today
translation.zh: 今天拍到了这位神秘好心人的身影

translation.en: when he dropped a third bag to carpenter Jesse Durham,
translation.zh: 影片中 他将第三个袋子放在木匠杰西杜尔汉的家门前

translation.en: just hours after a second bag was left at the home of a Brooklyn resident,
translation.zh: 几个小时前 一名布鲁克林区居民也在家门前发现一袋现金

translation.en: who wishes to remain anonymous.
translation.zh: 这名受益人拒绝透露姓名

translation.en: Who is this Good Samaritan who has now given away $300,000?
translation.zh: 这位送出三十万美元的“好撒马利亚人”到底是谁？

translation.en: From the footage, we can tell that he is male,
translation.zh: 从画面上看来 他是个男性

translation.en: approximately six feet tall,
translation.zh: 身高大约180公分

translation.en: but the rest remains a mystery.
translation.zh: 其余的依旧是个谜

translation.en: Kate Bradley, Channel 12 News.
translation.zh: 我是凯特布莱德利你在收看第12新闻频道

translation.en: [man] Channel 12 welcomes your comments on Good Sam.
translation.zh: 第12新闻频道欢迎你留言评论

translation.en: Check out our website at Channel12NewsNewYork.com
translation.zh: （吃饭的事 希望你改变主意 杰克）

translation.en: Someone we should know about?
translation.zh: 要告诉我们是谁吗？

translation.en: Uh, not particularly, no.
translation.zh: 不用了

translation.en: Okay. Nice story tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚的报道不错

translation.en: Well, thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: But you had more questions than answers, and that's not gonna hold up.
translation.zh: 可是你的报导存有许多疑问掌握的实情却不多 撑不久

translation.en: You need to get some solid info on Good Sam.
translation.zh: 你必须找出更可靠的消息

translation.en: Okay. I will have something solid for you by tomorrow.
translation.zh: 知道了 我明天会找出更可靠的消息

translation.en: If you get stuck--
translation.zh: 如果你应付不…

translation.en: -No, I'm not stuck. -If you get stuck,
translation.zh: -我没有应付不来-如果你应付不来

translation.en: we can bring Susan in.
translation.zh: 我可以叫苏珊帮你

translation.en: Good Sam is my story, David.
translation.zh: 大卫 “好撒马利亚人”是我的报道

translation.en: She might be able to help.
translation.zh: 她或许帮得上忙

translation.en: I don't need help. I got this.
translation.zh: 我不需要帮忙 我应付得来

translation.en: [David] You're in early. Did you sleep here?
translation.zh: 这么早就到了你昨晚在办公室过夜吗？

translation.en: I napped a little. I was working.
translation.zh: 我有小睡一下 我在忙着工作

translation.en: Listen, I think I found a really solid lead on Good Sam.
translation.zh: 我找到了非常可靠的线索

translation.en: I'm listening.
translation.zh: 说吧

translation.en: The people who found the money live all over the city, right?
translation.zh: 那些收到钱的人住在纽约市不同的角落 对吧？

translation.en: They have completely different backgrounds and-- and professions.
translation.zh: 他们来自不同的背景和职业

translation.en: It seems totally random.
translation.zh: 看起来似乎毫无关系

translation.en: In what world is that a solid lead?
translation.zh: 这也算是可靠的线索吗？

translation.en: It seems random, but then there's this.
translation.zh: 看起来毫无关系 不过你看看

translation.en: The second and third recipients, Marie Ellis and Jesse Durham,
translation.zh: 第二和第三个受益人分别是玛丽埃利斯和杰西杜尔汉

translation.en: both found their homes through Inniswell Properties.
translation.zh: 两人都是透过恩尼斯威尔房地产找到房子住

translation.en: Inniswell's a big firm. Big enough that it could be a coincidence,
translation.zh: 恩尼斯威尔房地产是一家大公司大得让人以为只是巧合

translation.en: but then, this.
translation.zh: 可是你看看

translation.en: Both Marie and Jesse worked with the same Realtor, Patrick Hayes.
translation.zh: 玛丽和杰西的房地产经纪人是同一个人 叫帕特里克赫士

translation.en: He's a partner at the firm. [David] So all this is some big publicity stunt?
translation.zh: -他也是该公司的合伙人-你认为这是一个宣传噱头？

translation.en: Get a load of this.
translation.zh: 你再看看这些新闻

translation.en: Back in May, Inniswell announced that they were going public.
translation.zh: 今年五月恩尼斯威尔房地产宣布上市

translation.en: Patrick led the press conference.
translation.zh: 记者会由帕特里克主持

translation.en: Everything fell apart due to an internal crisis.
translation.zh: 但由于公司爆发内部危机一切毁于一旦

translation.en: Just last week, the financial trades announced that the IPO is back on.
translation.zh: 可是在上星期 该公司在证券交易所恢复首次公开募股

translation.en: Interesting.
translation.zh: 有意思

translation.en: Now, if you consider the amount of publicity
translation.zh: 相较“好撒马利亚人”这个宣传手段

translation.en: that Inniswell would get as Good Sam, 300 grand's a bargain.
translation.zh: 为恩尼斯威尔房地产所带来的收益三十万美元只是小菜一碟

translation.en: What about Hayes? Can he confirm or deny?
translation.zh: 赫士有承认或否认吗？

translation.en: I haven't been able to get in touch with him yet.
translation.zh: 我到现在依然无法联络上他

translation.en: [David] So what's your plan?
translation.zh: 你打算怎么做？

translation.en: I'm gonna show up at his office and ask Patrick Hayes
translation.zh: 我打算到帕特里克赫士的办公室然后要他承认送钱

translation.en: to admit his agenda for giving all this money away.
translation.zh: 我打算到帕特里克赫士的办公室然后要他承认送钱 只是为了实现他自己的目的

translation.en: Do that and we'll promote Good Sam as a follow-up on our noon cast.
translation.zh: 去吧 我们会在傍晚时段播出“好撒马利亚人”的最新消息

translation.en: -Thanks, David. -Good work.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 大卫-做得好

translation.en: Hi, I'm Kate Bradley with Channel 12 News.
translation.zh: 你好 我是来自第12新闻频道的记者凯特布莱德利

translation.en: I'd like to speak with one of your partners, Patrick Hayes. Is he in?
translation.zh: 我想见一下你们公司的合伙人帕特里克赫士 请问他在吗？

translation.en: Can I ask what this is about?
translation.zh: 请问有什么事？

translation.en: I'd rather tell him directly. Do you know when he'll be in?
translation.zh: 我想亲自告诉他你知道他什么时候到办公室吗？

translation.en: I'm not sure.
translation.zh: 我也不确定

translation.en: Is that camera on? You're not gonna put me on the news, are you?
translation.zh: 你们在拍摄吗？我该不会上新闻吧？

translation.en: Well, not if we can talk to Patrick Hayes, but we've got to run something.
translation.zh: 如果能见到帕特里克赫士就不会但我们总得拍些什么 对吧？

translation.en: I'm sorry, I'm-- I'm just a temp. I started on Monday.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我只是临时接待员 我星期一才来上班的

translation.en: All I know is, uh...
translation.zh: 我只知道…

translation.en: I'm supposed to forward his mail.
translation.zh: 他的信我要帮他转寄

translation.en: -Let me go ask. -Great. Thank you.
translation.zh: -我去问问看-太好了 谢谢你

translation.en: This is where a partner at Inniswell Properties lives?
translation.zh: 恩尼斯威尔房地产的合伙人居然住在这里？

translation.en: No kidding. If he's a land baron, he sure hides it well.
translation.zh: 不是开玩笑的身为地产大亨 必须要藏得好好的

translation.en: -It should be this one. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -应该是这间了-没错

translation.en: Hi, I'm Kate Bradley. We're with Channel 12 News.
translation.zh: 你好 我是凯特布莱德利我们来自第12新闻频道

translation.en: Yeah, we met, actually.
translation.zh: 我知道 我们见过

translation.en: The other day at the Brooklyn warehouse fire.
translation.zh: 那晚在布鲁克林区仓库火灾现场

translation.en: That was you?
translation.zh: 你就是那个人？

translation.en: Hey. You took a big risk for a shot on the 11 o'clock news.
translation.zh: 你冒着生命危险只为了拍摄11点新闻时段的画面

translation.en: Well, that's what we do, right?
translation.zh: 那是我们分内事 不是吗？

translation.en: Both got to get close to the fire to do our jobs.
translation.zh: 我们都必须亲临火场 才能完成任务

translation.en: Yeah, except one of us had state-of-the-art fire protection
translation.zh: 但其中一人身穿完整的防火装备

translation.en: and the other one had a camera.
translation.zh: 而另一个人只抬着一台摄影机

translation.en: Uh, my camera, actually.
translation.zh: 那其实是我的摄影机

translation.en: Okay, but did you see the footage?
translation.zh: 算了 你没看见那些画面吗？

translation.en: I mean, you pulled three people out in ten minutes. It was unbelievable.
translation.zh: 你在十分钟内救出三个人太不可思议了

translation.en: Look, if you're here for an interview or something,
translation.zh: 如果你来是为了访问我

translation.en: you've gotta go through the FDNY press office.
translation.zh: 请你先取得纽约消防局公关部的同意

translation.en: Actually, we're here about Good Sam.
translation.zh: 其实我们想来采访“好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: Good who?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: In the last 24 hours,
translation.zh: 过去一天内

translation.en: three people have each found 100 grand in cash on their doorsteps.
translation.zh: 有三人分别在自家门前发现十万美元现金

translation.en: We're looking for the anonymous Good Samaritan behind it.
translation.zh: 我们正在努力找出这位“好撒马利亚人”的身份

translation.en: Okay, and how can I help?
translation.zh: 我能怎么帮到你们？

translation.en: Well, for starters... are you Good Sam?
translation.zh: 首先 告诉我你是那位“好撒马利亚人”吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: But, uh, I'd like to know why you came all the way down here to ask me that.
translation.zh: 不过我想知道你为什么找上我

translation.en: Two of the three people who found the money got their homes through Inniswell Properties.
translation.zh: 其中两个受益人通过恩尼斯威尔房地产找到了房子

translation.en: Yeah, I think you got your wires crossed.
translation.zh: 我想你搞错了

translation.en: Patrick Hayes used to be a partner at Inniswell Properties.
translation.zh: 帕特里克赫士是恩尼斯威尔房地产的前任合伙人

translation.en: I'm his brother, Eric.
translation.zh: 我是他弟弟艾瑞克

translation.en: Um, wait. He used to be a partner?
translation.zh: 慢着 他是前任合伙人？

translation.en: Yeah, he died five months ago.
translation.zh: 没错 他五个月前过世了

translation.en: I'm so sorry. I-I had no idea.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我不知道

translation.en: Well, I'm sorry I couldn't be of more help.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我帮不上忙

translation.en: If you, uh-- if you think of anything, you can call me...
translation.zh: 如果你想到了什么 可以打给我

translation.en: -anytime. -Sure.
translation.zh: -随时-没问题

translation.en: Good luck with your story.
translation.zh: 祝你报导顺利

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: -[Josh] Never thought I'd see it. -See what?
translation.zh: -没想到我会看到那一幕-看到什么？

translation.en: You are rock solid when you're interviewing the police chief or the mayor, but...
translation.zh: 你访问警察局长和市长时作风都非常强硬

translation.en: when you were talking to Eric Hayes... you were flustered.
translation.zh: 可是对上艾瑞克赫士却紧张起来

translation.en: I was not flustered. I'm never flustered.
translation.zh: 我才没有紧张呢 我从来不会紧张的

translation.en: You were pretty flustered.
translation.zh: -你刚才表现得很紧张-才没有

translation.en: -[Kate] No. -Flustered.
translation.zh: 你紧张了

translation.en: -[cell phone vibrates] -Look at Kate. She is flustered!
translation.zh: 看看凯特 她紧张了

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: [man] Hello. Have I reached the talented Kate Bradley?
translation.zh: 请问是才华洋溢的凯特布莱德利吗？

translation.en: This is Kate. Who's this?
translation.zh: 没错 我是凯特 请问是哪一位？

translation.en: Jack Hansen.
translation.zh: 杰克汉森

translation.en: How are you this morning?
translation.zh: 今早过得如何？

translation.en: I see you didn't let the fact that I never gave you my number stop you.
translation.zh: 看来就算我不给你号码你也不会打退堂鼓

translation.en: Oh, I have top secret ways to get that confidential information.
translation.zh: 我私底下有办法弄到你的私人联络号码

translation.en: Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Is it someone by the name of Senator Ashok Bradley?
translation.zh: 请问你的线人是阿硕克布莱德利参议员吗？

translation.en: Any chance you might reconsider having dinner with me?
translation.zh: 不知道你还会不会考虑跟我共进晚餐？

translation.en: Or shall I tell my skywriter pilot
translation.zh: 或者让我的飞行员撰稿人飞过第12新闻频道的上空

translation.en: to fly over Channel 12 and write out an invitation?
translation.zh: 或者让我的飞行员撰稿人飞过第12新闻频道的上空 在空中写下邀请函？

translation.en: Hmm, an invitation by skywriter would be original but, uh, overboard.
translation.zh: 叫飞行员在空中写邀请函虽然很有创意 但也太夸张了

translation.en: I've been thinking about your rule
translation.zh: 我这几天一直在想

translation.en: of not dating anyone in your father's political circle,
translation.zh: 你说你从不跟你父亲政治圈里的人约会

translation.en: and... does it extend to donors?
translation.zh: 但捐款人不算是圈内人吧？

translation.en: 'Cause, I mean, I'm just a lowly hedge fund manager
translation.zh: 再说我只是微不足道的对冲基金经理 而这个小人物只是想请你吃顿晚餐

translation.en: trying to take you out for dinner.
translation.zh: 而这个小人物只是想请你吃顿晚餐

translation.en: Mmm.
translation.zh: 这…

translation.en: Um... Sure. Why not?
translation.zh: 好啊 何乐不为？

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: I'll swing by the station, pick you up at seven?
translation.zh: 我晚上7点开车到电视台接你？

translation.en: Seven it is. See you then.
translation.zh: 7点 没问题 到时见

translation.en: Sounds good. See you then.
translation.zh: 好极了 到时见

translation.en: There. See?
translation.zh: 你看见了？

translation.en: I'm going out with someone else. Yeah, but you weren't the least bit flustered.
translation.zh: -我和其他人约会去了-可是你说话时不紧张啊

translation.en: -Whatever. -[cell phone chimes and vibrates]
translation.zh: 随你怎么说

translation.en: Oh. We gotta go to Staten Island.
translation.zh: 天啊 -我们要到史丹顿岛走一趟了-怎么了？

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: -我们要到史丹顿岛走一趟了-怎么了？

translation.en: [Kate] David's orders, via text.
translation.zh: 大卫通过短信下达的命令

translation.en: David can text?
translation.zh: 大卫会传短信吗？

translation.en: He's learning.
translation.zh: 他在努力学习中

translation.en: "Goop Wam made another muddy drop."
translation.zh: “好‘煞’马利亚人又‘怂’钱了”

translation.en: -Another one? -Same bag, same cash.
translation.zh: -又发现一袋现金？-一袋数额相同的现金

translation.en: And this time, he left a note.
translation.zh: 这回他留下了纸条

translation.en: Okay. [exhales]
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Good Sam is the man that everyone in New York is talking about,
translation.zh: “好撒马利亚人”成为纽约市民茶余饭后的话题

translation.en: and yet his identity remains a mystery.
translation.zh: 但他的真实身份依然是个谜

translation.en: Kate Bradley reports from Staten Island,
translation.zh: 凯特布莱德利在史丹顿岛现场报道

translation.en: where a paralegal found $100,000 today, along with a note.
translation.zh: 一名律师助理今日收到十万美元现金袋子里留有纸条

translation.en: What did the note say?
translation.zh: 纸条上写着什么？

translation.en: "This is for you to go to law school."
translation.zh: “这笔钱给你去读法学院”

translation.en: Do you want to go to law school?
translation.zh: 你想上法学院吗？

translation.en: It's been my dream my whole life.
translation.zh: 那是我这辈子的梦想

translation.en: I've been a paralegal for ten years.
translation.zh: 我当律师助理十年了

translation.en: [woman] You hang around lawyers that long...
translation.zh: 跟律师相处了这么久

translation.en: you kind of wonder what it'd be like to be the boss.
translation.zh: 有时候好奇想知道当上司的感觉

translation.en: [Kate] The recipient says she was accepted...
translation.zh: 受益人表示她已经接受…

translation.en: -You look nice. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -真好看-谢谢

translation.en: -Where are you going? -Um, just out.
translation.zh: -打算去哪儿？-就出去而已

translation.en: -Okay. Good night. -Good night.
translation.zh: -祝你有个愉快的夜晚-你也是

translation.en: [Kate] We asked who might have heard about this life-long dream.
translation.zh: 问起谁知道她有这个一生的梦想时…

translation.en: Just about everyone I know.
translation.zh: 每个人都知道

translation.en: But no one has $100,000 to give me.
translation.zh: 只是没人有十万美元可以给我

translation.en: [Susan] Thank you, Kate.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 凯特

translation.en: My dad still doesn't understand
translation.zh: 我爸到现在还不理解

translation.en: why I chose to go to journalism school instead of law school like he did.
translation.zh: 我为什么选择上新闻学院 而不像他那样去上法学院

translation.en: Yeah, but...
translation.zh: 是啊 可是…

translation.en: I know that your dad is very proud of you.
translation.zh: 我看得出你爸非常以你为傲

translation.en: He's slowly warming up to this whole reporter thing.
translation.zh: 他渐渐接受我成为记者的事实了

translation.en: He likes the Good Sam stories I'm doing.
translation.zh: 他喜欢我的“好撒马利亚人”报道

translation.en: Wow. Everywhere I go, I keep hearing about this Good Sam.
translation.zh: 天啊 我发现无论去到哪里 大家都在谈论这位“好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: Oh, I can't believe the numbers we're getting
translation.zh: 天啊 实在难以置信 就因为报道某人做了好事电视台的收视率就高居不下

translation.en: on a story about someone doing good.
translation.zh: 就因为报道某人做了好事电视台的收视率就高居不下

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah. It's crazy.
translation.zh: -是吗？-对啊 真是不可思议

translation.en: Speaking of good, this is what they're famous for here.
translation.zh: 提到“好”这个字这家餐厅的食物很“好”吃

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 我尝尝看

translation.en: I'm not usually a dessert fan, but, wow, that is incredible.
translation.zh: 我向来不爱吃甜品 但这也太好吃了

translation.en: See? And you never would have known if you hadn't bent your dating rule.
translation.zh: 如果你没有打破约会惯例的话就不可能尝到这等美食

translation.en: I'm glad you did.
translation.zh: 很高兴你愿意赴约

translation.en: You know, I had almost forgotten that I met you at that fundraiser.
translation.zh: 我差点就忘了我是在筹款活动认识你

translation.en: I hope it's not just the peach cobbler speaking.
translation.zh: 希望你不是吃下鲜桃馅饼后变得语无伦次了

translation.en: It is not just the peach cobbler speaking.
translation.zh: 不是那一回事

translation.en: But if you thought I was gonna share this with you, you're sadly mistaken.
translation.zh: 不过如果你认为我愿意跟你分享那就大错特错了

translation.en: So I'm gonna order my own now?
translation.zh: 那我得给自己点一份了？

translation.en: -Yeah, I think that's best. -Okay.
translation.zh: -再好不过了-好吧

translation.en: Interest in Good Sam continues to grow,
translation.zh: 越来越多人想知道他究竟是谁

translation.en: with all five boroughs abuzz with these random acts of generosity,
translation.zh: 纽约市五个不同地区的市民对他的善举津津乐道

translation.en: who could be behind them,
translation.zh: 这个好心人究竟是谁？

translation.en: and when and where the next bag of money might appear.
translation.zh: 下一个袋子将会在什么时候出现？将会出现在什么地方？

translation.en: If I had $100,000, I'd move out of my parents' house
translation.zh: 如果我有十万美元 我会搬离父母家

translation.en: and get a sweet apartment downtown.
translation.zh: 然后在市中心买一间漂亮的公寓

translation.en: If I had $100,000,
translation.zh: 如果我有十万美元

translation.en: I would pay off mine and my daughter's student loans,
translation.zh: 我会付清我女儿的大学贷款

translation.en: and then I'd take us both to Hawaii.
translation.zh: 然后带她一起去夏威夷度假

translation.en: We received thousands of phone calls, emails, and videos
translation.zh: 针对本台的报道我们接到几千个电话

translation.en: in response to our reporting,
translation.zh: 收到许多电邮和视频

translation.en: like this one from Sylvia, one of our youngest viewers.
translation.zh: 例如这个来自席薇亚的视频她是本台其中一位最年轻的观众

translation.en: Hi, Good Sam. My name is Sylvia. I hope you see this.
translation.zh: 好撒马利亚人 我叫席薇亚我希望你能看到这个视频

translation.en: My mommy is really sick,
translation.zh: 我母亲病得很重

translation.en: and we need your help for some medicine she needs.
translation.zh: 我们需要你的帮忙来买她需要的药

translation.en: Could you choose our family next?
translation.zh: 你下回可以帮助我们吗？

translation.en: Still, there are no leads on Good Sam's identity.
translation.zh: 至今为止 “好撒马利亚人”的身份依然是个谜

translation.en: The question at the top of every New Yorker's mind,
translation.zh: 如今每个纽约市民的脑海中都有一个问题

translation.en: Good Sam, who are you?
translation.zh: “好撒马利亚人” 你到底是谁？

translation.en: Any new leads on Good Sam's identity? Oh, how'd that Realtor thing work out?
translation.zh: 有没有“好撒马利亚人”身份的消息？你查过那个房地产经纪人了吗？

translation.en: Dead end, just like everything else. We know who he's not.
translation.zh: 线索断了 就像其他线索一样不是我们要找的人

translation.en: Yeah, we spoke to a bunch of charities and foundations.
translation.zh: 我们联络了好几个慈善机构和基金会

translation.en: They all said that no reasonable non-profit would ever operate this way.
translation.zh: 他们都认为没有任何正常的非营利组织会做这种事

translation.en: -We even called an FBI profiler. -Any insights?
translation.zh: -我们还联络了联邦调查局的侧写师-有线索吗？

translation.en: Just that we have no idea who Good Sam is.
translation.zh: 没有人知道“好撒马利亚人”是谁

translation.en: Look, he might seem like Santa Claus or some other benevolent figure,
translation.zh: 表面上这个人似乎表现出圣诞老人的好心人形象

translation.en: but the profiler said it's just as likely that something darker, even dangerous, is motivating this.
translation.zh: 但侧写师说事实可能是背后有个偏黑暗危险的势力在主导一切

translation.en: Kate, there's a man here asking for you.
translation.zh: 凯特 有个人来找你

translation.en: He says he's Good Sam.
translation.zh: 他自称是“好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: What-- What does he look like?
translation.zh: 长相如何？

translation.en: Mid-thirties, maybe six foot-ish.
translation.zh: 大概三十多岁 身高180公分

translation.en: Matches Jesse Durham's security footage.
translation.zh: 符合闭路摄像头画面中的身影

translation.en: Um... yeah, tell him I'll be right there.
translation.zh: 告诉他我马上过去见他

translation.en: So, Tyler, is It? Good Sam.
translation.zh: -你叫泰勒 对吧？-我就是“好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 原来如此

translation.en: Uh, tell me how you got all this money to give away.
translation.zh: 谈谈你怎么筹得这笔款项

translation.en: I built an app for this little company and it got sold to a giant company.
translation.zh: 我开发了一个应用程序然后卖给一家大公司

translation.en: And, um, why are you doing all this?
translation.zh: 为什么你要这么做？

translation.en: I wanted to do an anonymous social experiment for good.
translation.zh: 我想做个社会实验

translation.en: To share my wealth with random strangers.
translation.zh: 把自己的财富随机分享给陌生人

translation.en: Isn't that what we should all be doing?
translation.zh: 这不是我们应该做的事吗？

translation.en: Sure, yeah.
translation.zh: 对 没错

translation.en: And, um, how did you choose your recipients?
translation.zh: 你怎么挑选受益人？

translation.en: I wrote some code
translation.zh: 我写了一套编码

translation.en: that would randomly select residential addresses in New York City.
translation.zh: 通过这个系统随机挑选纽约市的住址

translation.en: Ah. And why this way, though?
translation.zh: 为什么选用这个方法？

translation.en: You know, leaving $100,000 on people's doorsteps.
translation.zh: 为什么在门前留下十万美元？

translation.en: I found it was a creative way to do it.
translation.zh: 我认为这么做是一种创意

translation.en: It is, isn't it?
translation.zh: 不是吗？

translation.en: Are we doing the interview in there, at the-- the news desk?
translation.zh: 我们打算在这里做访问吗？不在新闻台前？

translation.en: -Uh, I need to collect some facts first. -Because everybody knows I'm him.
translation.zh: -我得先了解情况-每个人都知道我就是本人

translation.en: I mean, that's-- that's why they're all looking at me.
translation.zh: 所以他们才盯着我看

translation.en: A few days ago, you left $100,000 for a woman so she could go to law school.
translation.zh: 几天前 你在一个女人家门前留下十万美元资助她就读法学院

translation.en: What was her first name again?
translation.zh: 她姓什么来着？

translation.en: I... Sorry, I-- I can't remember every detail.
translation.zh: 抱歉 有些细节我记不得了

translation.en: It's okay. Take a moment.
translation.zh: 没关系 你慢慢想

translation.en: I never mentioned her name in any of my reports,
translation.zh: 我不曾在报道中提到她的名字

translation.en: so you'd be the only one to know.
translation.zh: 所以只有你会知道

translation.en: Remind me, what is her name?
translation.zh: 提醒我一下 她叫什么来着？

translation.en: Is it, um, Elizabeth Haywood? Is that it?
translation.zh: 是不是叫伊丽莎白海伍德？

translation.en: Yeah, that's it.
translation.zh: 对 没错

translation.en: That's-- That's her name. I remember now.
translation.zh: 那就是她的名字 我想起了

translation.en: Mm-hmm. Her name was Faith.
translation.zh: 是吗？她叫菲丝

translation.en: How could you forget someone's name who you just gave $100,000?
translation.zh: 你刚送给她十万美元怎么可能忘记她的名字？

translation.en: I think this Good Sam is inspiring hope.
translation.zh: 我认为这位“好撒马利亚人”给了这个世界希望

translation.en: Times like these, people need it.
translation.zh: 在这个时代 我们都需要希望

translation.en: I just keep wondering what he hopes to gain by all this.
translation.zh: 我只想知道他到底想从中得到什么

translation.en: Well, is it possible that he doesn't expect anything?
translation.zh: 可能他不求回报呢？

translation.en: That's pretty unlikely.
translation.zh: 不太可能吧

translation.en: The problem is he stopped giving.
translation.zh: 问题是他最近不再送钱了

translation.en: I mean, biggest story of my career and it looks like it might be over.
translation.zh: 我职业生涯中最轰动的新闻似乎要石沉大海了

translation.en: Not one single money drop yesterday.
translation.zh: 昨天他没送出半分钱

translation.en: I have a feeling you'll find a way to keep it going.
translation.zh: 我总觉得你会想办法让他继续送钱

translation.en: Thanks, Dad.
translation.zh: 爸 谢谢你

translation.en: Any chance you'll come with me to the mayor's house tonight?
translation.zh: 你今晚能不能陪我去一趟市长府邸？

translation.en: I know, I know. You can't stand political events, but... you seemed to enjoy the last one.
translation.zh: 我懂 你不喜欢政治活动可是上一回你玩得挺开心的

translation.en: The last one was not awful, I'll admit. Yeah.
translation.zh: 不得不说 上一回确实不错

translation.en: Could it be because of Jack Hansen?
translation.zh: 是因为杰克汉森在场吗？

translation.en: Our brief conversation wasn't dull.
translation.zh: 我们挺聊得来的

translation.en: You shouldn't hold the fact that he's one of my donors against him.
translation.zh: 你不应该因为他是我的捐款人而拒他于门外

translation.en: He's a... He's a smart guy.
translation.zh: 他是个聪明人

translation.en: A lot of smart guys in New York, Dad.
translation.zh: 爸 纽约的聪明人也不少

translation.en: And ambitious, like you are.
translation.zh: 他也有雄心壮志 跟你一样

translation.en: And when you're not busy chasing news stories, you... might like to get to know him better.
translation.zh: 以后如果有空档的话不妨进一步了解他

translation.en: We'll see.
translation.zh: 再说吧

translation.en: So, Christina, a week ago, you received $100,000 from an anonymous donor.
translation.zh: 克里斯蒂娜 一星期前你收到一名不明人士赠送的十万美元

translation.en: Can you tell us what's happened since then?
translation.zh: 可否告诉我们收到捐款后发生的事？

translation.en: I would say that Good Sam changed my life forever.
translation.zh: 我认为这位“好撒马利亚人”改变了我的一生

translation.en: And not just because I'm able to take care of my family and buy a few new things,
translation.zh: 不仅因为我现在能够照顾家人添购一些新物品

translation.en: but because of how he changed me.
translation.zh: 也因为他改变了我

translation.en: And how's that?
translation.zh: 怎么说？

translation.en: He made me see that I could help others.
translation.zh: 他让我发现自己也有能力帮助其他人

translation.en: Like my neighbor. You know? She takes three buses to get to her job.
translation.zh: 比如我的邻居你知道她每天搭三趟巴士上班吗？

translation.en: So, I decided why don't I help her like Good Sam helped me?
translation.zh: 我心想 不如我来帮助她吧？就像“好撒马利亚人”帮助我一样

translation.en: So I went out and I bought her a car.
translation.zh: 于是我买了一辆车给她

translation.en: You bought her a car?
translation.zh: 你买了一辆车给她？

translation.en: I gave it to her this morning.
translation.zh: 我今早把车交给她了

translation.en: Her whole family cried.
translation.zh: 她一家人喜极而泣

translation.en: And me...
translation.zh: 而我呢？

translation.en: I've never been happier about anything I've done.
translation.zh: 这是我这辈子做过最快乐的事

translation.en: So getting this gift from Good Sam -inspired you to give to someone else? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 因为你收到“好撒马利亚人”的礼物所以你也决定帮助他人？

translation.en: It's spreading.
translation.zh: 善良会感染

translation.en: Like miracles do.
translation.zh: 就像奇迹一样

translation.en: I can't believe Christina used her money to buy a car for a stranger.
translation.zh: 克里斯蒂娜居然用那笔钱买一辆车给一个陌生人

translation.en: Yeah. And that Marie gave all her stash to some charity?
translation.zh: 玛丽也把那笔钱捐给慈善机构

translation.en: Yeah. To pancreatic cancer research at her hospital.
translation.zh: 捐给她医院旗下的胰腺癌研究机构

translation.en: She texted me.
translation.zh: 她发短信告诉我

translation.en: Apparently, their donations have tripled since we mentioned it in the news.
translation.zh: 自从我在新闻中提到那家机构后捐款增加了整整两倍

translation.en: It's like Good Sam's generosity is contagious.
translation.zh: “好撒马利亚人”的善举好像会传染似的

translation.en: Here we go.
translation.zh: 又来了

translation.en: Hey, David. We're headed back right now.
translation.zh: 大卫 我们正赶着回去呢

translation.en: -[David] Are you still in the Bronx? -Yeah, why?
translation.zh: -还在布朗克斯区吗？-是 怎么了？

translation.en: Police scanner said there's a construction worker dangling off the side of the Hope Watson building.
translation.zh: 警队监控广播显示有一名建筑工友悬挂在赫伯沃森大厦外侧

translation.en: Your van's the closest.
translation.zh: 你们车最靠近现场

translation.en: -Can you be live in three? -Three minutes?
translation.zh: -能在三分钟后直播吗？-三分钟？

translation.en: It's a news van, not a time machine.
translation.zh: 这是新闻车 不是时光机

translation.en: I heard that, Josh. I want eyeballs on this one.
translation.zh: 我听见了 乔什我一定要看见这个画面

translation.en: The fire department can't reach him with ladders,
translation.zh: 消防队的梯子不够高

translation.en: so they're gonna send someone from the roof.
translation.zh: 于是决定派人从楼顶下去救人

translation.en: My FDNY source says it's the rescue one team from station 72.
translation.zh: 根据纽约消防局透露的消息 他们派出了72号分局的拯救人员

translation.en: [Kate] 72? Who's the rescuer?
translation.zh: 72号？拯救人员是谁？

translation.en: Uh, Eric Hayes, but don't say his name on the air.
translation.zh: 他叫艾瑞克赫士 但别公开他的姓名

translation.en: -Looks like we're first on the scene. -[David] Great.
translation.zh: -看来我们是第一个抵达现场的媒体-太好了

translation.en: -Calling my guy at the fire station. -David, are you seeing this?
translation.zh: -我试着联络消防局的线人-大卫 你看见了吗？

translation.en: We're gonna go live in ten seconds. Stand by, Kate.
translation.zh: 十秒后直播 凯特 准备就绪

translation.en: Keep your phone up, and I'll feed you info as it comes in.
translation.zh: 别挂掉手机 我一有消息马上给你

translation.en: In five, four, three...
translation.zh: 五、四、三…

translation.en: [Kate] We are live in the Bronx
translation.zh: 我们在布朗克斯区为你直击报道

translation.en: where a construction worker repairing brickwork
translation.zh: 一名建筑工友在修补外墙时

translation.en: now finds himself trapped, hanging over a hundred feet above ground.
translation.zh: 支架突然坍塌如今悬在30米高的半空中

translation.en: FDNY are attempting a daring rescue here,
translation.zh: 纽约消防局展开了一场惊心动魄的拯救行动

translation.en: sending a lone firefighter rappelling down the side of the building.
translation.zh: 并派出一名消防员从大楼高处降下施救

translation.en: The worker is trying to--
translation.zh: 该名建筑工友企图…

translation.en: -[gasps] Oh! Uh... -[crowd clamoring]
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: The worker has slipped.
translation.zh: 建筑工友刚刚摔了一跤

translation.en: He is now clinging to the edge of his scaffolding,
translation.zh: 如今悬挂在支架边缘

translation.en: surely panicked it won't hold his weight much longer.
translation.zh: 他肯定惊慌失措以他的体重看来 相信无法支撑太久

translation.en: Okay, it looks like the rescuer's got him.
translation.zh: 拯救人员好像已经抓住他了

translation.en: He's attaching him to his harness.
translation.zh: 拯救人员把他扣住了

translation.en: And it looks like they're okay.
translation.zh: 看起来没事了

translation.en: Another astonishing rescue from our heroes at the FDNY.
translation.zh: 纽约消防局的英雄们再次完成了拯救任务 立下大功

translation.en: Big sighs of relief here in the South Bronx.
translation.zh: 布朗克斯南部的人终于松了一大口气

translation.en: Go to a stand-up wrap-up, and get me an interview for the six o'clock cast.
translation.zh: 来个新闻总结为6点新闻时段做个访谈

translation.en: A perilous situation, a dangerous rescue.
translation.zh: 一场攸关人命的意外一个惊心动魄的拯救行动

translation.en: A New York City construction worker will go home safe to his family,
translation.zh: 多亏了纽约消防局的一名无名英雄

translation.en: thanks to a hero at the FDNY.
translation.zh: 这位纽约市建筑工友得以安全地回到家人身边

translation.en: Reporting live from the Bronx, I'm Kate Bradley, Channel 12 News.
translation.zh: 我是第12新闻频道的凯特布莱德利在布朗克斯区为你做现场报道

translation.en: -[Josh] He said he doesn't do interviews. -[Kate] Sit tight till I talk him into it.
translation.zh: -他说过不接受访问了-看我怎么说服他

translation.en: Um, excuse me.
translation.zh: 你好 不好意思

translation.en: I'm looking for Eric Hayes.
translation.zh: 我想找艾瑞克赫士 麻烦你告诉他

translation.en: Could you let him know that Kate from Channel 12 News is here, please?
translation.zh: 我想找艾瑞克赫士 麻烦你告诉他 我是来自第12新闻频道的记者凯特

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Hayes is in, but he's not talking to reporters.
translation.zh: 赫士确实有在可是他不接受记者访问

translation.en: -Oh-- -Hey, George, it's all good.
translation.zh: -这…-乔治 没关系

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: -I was at the construction worker rescue. -Again?
translation.zh: -我在那场工地意外的救援现场-又见面了？

translation.en: -We've gotta stop meeting like this. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 我们不能老在这种情况下见面

translation.en: I'm really glad you're okay.
translation.zh: 我很高兴你没事

translation.en: Yeah. Looks more impressive than it is.
translation.zh: 其实没那么危险

translation.en: You know, we're pretty well-trained.
translation.zh: 我们都接受过严格的训练

translation.en: Yeah, but it must be hard putting your life on the line every day.
translation.zh: 可是你们每天命悬一线 肯定不容易

translation.en: I like knowing I'm making things better, you know.
translation.zh: 能帮上忙我就很高兴

translation.en: See, that's exactly why you should do an interview.
translation.zh: 所以你应该接受访问才对

translation.en: Look, I cover the bummer beat every single day.
translation.zh: 我每天都在报道天灾人祸

translation.en: Sorry, the what?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: You know, um, disaster, murder, violence, the things that go wrong.
translation.zh: 就是跟自然灾难、谋杀暴力等天灾人祸有关的负面新闻

translation.en: But today, I watched you take something that had gone horribly wrong... and you made it right.
translation.zh: 可是我今天亲眼看见你把危机化为美事

translation.en: And when that happens...
translation.zh: 这种事竟然发生了

translation.en: viewers need to see that.
translation.zh: 就应该让观众看见

translation.en: I feel like you can talk anyone into an interview.
translation.zh: 你大可说服其他人接受访问

translation.en: Just not today. You're not gonna convince me.
translation.zh: 我今天不行 你是说服不了我的

translation.en: Well, can I ask why?
translation.zh: 介意告诉我为什么吗？

translation.en: You ask a lot of questions.
translation.zh: 你问太多问题了

translation.en: Well, I am a reporter. It's kind of what we do.
translation.zh: 我是个记者 这是我的分内之事

translation.en: We can't all be heroes like you, you know.
translation.zh: 不是每个人都跟你一样可以成为英雄

translation.en: I'm not a hero. I'm just doing my job.
translation.zh: 我不是英雄 那只是我的分内之事

translation.en: You know, I'm at work right now, just like you.
translation.zh: 我现在也在工作 就跟你一样

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 也对

translation.en: So, really, no interview?
translation.zh: 你真的不接受访问？

translation.en: My editor's gonna kill me.
translation.zh: 编辑会杀了我的

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: But maybe we should do this again sometime,
translation.zh: 不过我不介意再见到你

translation.en: you know, without the emergency vehicles.
translation.zh: 如果能在没有消防车在场的时候更好

translation.en: -Um, yeah. Yeah, I'd like that. -[cell phone vibrates and chimes]
translation.zh: 好啊 我不介意

translation.en: Oh, sorry.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 你答应了？

translation.en: Central Park? I got Sunday off.
translation.zh: 地点定在中央公园？我星期日放假

translation.en: -Yeah. Yeah, Sunday-- Sunday works great. -[cell phone chimes]
translation.zh: 好啊 星期日再好不过了

translation.en: I'm so sorry, I have to go. This is my editor.
translation.zh: 实在不好意思 我该走了 编辑找我了

translation.en: Apparently Good Sam is giving away money again.
translation.zh: 看来“好撒马利亚人”又开始送钱了

translation.en: -Really? Where? -Uh...
translation.zh: 真的吗？在哪里？

translation.en: Sunnyside and Lenox Hill.
translation.zh: 在阳边区和莱诺克斯山

translation.en: You really can't be Good Sam, can you?
translation.zh: 你不可能是“好撒马利亚人”吧？

translation.en: -I've had eyes on you all day. -[phone chimes] Okay, I gotta go.
translation.zh: 不可能 我整天都在追踪你 我先走了

translation.en: I'll see you on Sunday.
translation.zh: 星期天见

translation.en: -[Eric] I'll text you. -Great.
translation.zh: -我会发短信给你-好啊

translation.en: Hey, Lauren said that you-- -What's going on? -[sighs]
translation.zh: 劳伦说你…这到底怎么回事？

translation.en: We got scooped.
translation.zh: 新闻被挖走了

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: That woman in Sunnyside who found a hundred grand...
translation.zh: 阳边区有个女人收获十万美元

translation.en: Channel 3 just reported it an hour ago.
translation.zh: 第三新闻频道早在一小时前报道了

translation.en: -You're kidding. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -怎么可能？-真的

translation.en: The family in Lenox Hill... Channel 9 just reported that on their six o'clock cast.
translation.zh: 莱诺克斯山一家人的访问第九新闻频道刚在6点新闻时段播出

translation.en: -But you sent me to that building rescue. -No, no.
translation.zh: -是你派我去采访工地救援行动的-不是我

translation.en: The news sent you.
translation.zh: 是新闻

translation.en: And you knocked it out of the park.
translation.zh: 而你表现得非常出色

translation.en: Kate...
translation.zh: 凯特

translation.en: you were meant for the bummer beat.
translation.zh: 你适合报道天灾人祸

translation.en: That's your thing.
translation.zh: 那才是你擅长的领域

translation.en: Fires, car crashes, Black Friday riots at the mall.
translation.zh: 火灾、车祸以及购物广场发生黑五暴动

translation.en: This Good Sam story, not so much.
translation.zh: 不太适合报道“好撒马利亚人”的新闻

translation.en: Is this supposed to be some kind of pep talk, 'cause I'm not--
translation.zh: 你这是在激励我吗？我不想…

translation.en: Management wants a bigger name on this.
translation.zh: 高层希望让一个更有名气的记者报道

translation.en: They want Susan.
translation.zh: 他们要苏珊报道

translation.en: On my story?
translation.zh: 要苏珊报道我的新闻？

translation.en: Come on, Kate. You know how this works.
translation.zh: 别这样 凯特 你懂规矩的

translation.en: Every other station has their most senior reporter on it,
translation.zh: 其他电视台都派出最资深的记者追踪这则新闻

translation.en: and Susan does have 15 years' experience--
translation.zh: 苏珊有15年的经验 而且…

translation.en: And an Emmy Award. I know. I get it.
translation.zh: 还得过艾美奖 我知道 我懂

translation.en: But I'm the one that broke this story, remember?
translation.zh: 可是这则新闻是我带动的难道你们忘了吗？

translation.en: Please just give me some more time. I will find Good Sam.
translation.zh: 请再给我一些时间我一定能找到“好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: It's a done deal.
translation.zh: 高层已经定案了

translation.en: Susan's out covering the latest drop-offs.
translation.zh: 苏珊正在报道最新消息

translation.en: [David] Look...
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Send her your notes.
translation.zh: 把你的笔记传给她

translation.en: I've got you at 10:00 a.m. in Queens, covering the garbage strike deadline.
translation.zh: 我安排你早上10点报道皇后区的垃圾工人罢工行动

translation.en: Garbage strike.
translation.zh: 垃圾工人罢工行动

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: It'll be an easy day. You could use it.
translation.zh: 今天的工作不会太辛苦 也歇歇

translation.en: Yeah, okay.
translation.zh: 知道了

translation.en: Kate...
translation.zh: 凯特

translation.en: There's a bigger story out there for you.
translation.zh: 总有更轰动的新闻等着你报道

translation.en: Damn it.
translation.zh: 该死的

translation.en: Good Sam struck again today.
translation.zh: “好撒马利亚人”再度出击

translation.en: New York City's mysterious philanthropist left $100,000 cash
translation.zh: 这位纽约市的神秘好心人在一户人家门前

translation.en: on a lucky family's doorstep in Queens.
translation.zh: 留下十万美元现金

translation.en: This is the seventh gift from New York City's Good Sam.
translation.zh: 这也是“好撒马利亚人”送出的第七份现金

translation.en: [Josh] Do we have to listen to Susan's report on our story?
translation.zh: 天啊 有必要听苏珊报道我们的新闻吗？

translation.en: -It's killing me. -I know.
translation.zh: -我难受死了-我知道

translation.en: From Hunters Point, Queens, I'm Susan Andrews...
translation.zh: 我是苏珊安德鲁斯 在皇后区猎人角…

translation.en: Wait, Hunters Point?
translation.zh: 等一下 猎人角？

translation.en: -What's up? -Well...
translation.zh: -怎么了？-这…

translation.en: the first four Good Sam gifts were left all over the city, but...
translation.zh: “好撒马利亚人”的首四个袋子分布在市中心地区 可是…

translation.en: Look.
translation.zh: 你看

translation.en: These last three were close together.
translation.zh: 最后三个袋子的分布地点非常接近

translation.en: David took you off Good Sam.
translation.zh: 大卫不让你报道了

translation.en: I'm allowed to be curious.
translation.zh: 但我好奇不行吗？

translation.en: Consider this my new hobby.
translation.zh: 就当是我的新爱好吧

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Just a text message from someone claiming to be Good Sam.
translation.zh: 一个自称是“好撒马利亚人”发来的短信

translation.en: What's it say?
translation.zh: -写什么？-不会吧？

translation.en: Seriously? I'm sure it's just another fake.
translation.zh: -写什么？-不会吧？ 相信又是另一个假冒的人

translation.en: "Dear Kate, I want to set the record straight about who I am
translation.zh: “凯特 我想表明自己的身份

translation.en: and why I've been giving away substantial sums of money."
translation.zh: 以及说明自己为何捐出那些巨款”

translation.en: Scooch.
translation.zh: 挪过去一点

translation.en: "I'm willing to reveal myself to you, and only you,
translation.zh: “我愿意向你透露真实的身份但只有你能知道

translation.en: a reporter I know I can trust."
translation.zh: 毕竟你是我信任的记者”

translation.en: I mean, we've heard this before.
translation.zh: 这种事也不是第一次了

translation.en: Lots of guys out there claiming to be Good Sam.
translation.zh: 很多人自称是“好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: "If you'd like proof that I'm Good Sam,
translation.zh: “如果想要我是好撒马利亚人的证据

translation.en: go see John Baylor at 225 Watson in Astoria.
translation.zh: 请马上到阿斯托里亚 沃森街225号 找约翰贝勒

translation.en: I left $100,000 on his front porch an hour ago."
translation.zh: 我一小时前在他家门前留下十万美元现金”

translation.en: Okay, but seriously, I'm sure reporters all over the city got this text.
translation.zh: 说实话 我相信整座城市里的记者都有收到这则短信

translation.en: Yeah, sounds pretty spammy to me too,
translation.zh: 是啊 看起来像一则垃圾信息

translation.en: but Watson Street in Astoria is right near Hunters Point.
translation.zh: 但我知道阿斯托里亚沃森街就在猎人角附近

translation.en: -Is it? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -是吗？-没错

translation.en: You know what? You're right. It is.
translation.zh: 没错 你说得对

translation.en: So then, what are we waiting for?
translation.zh: 那我们还在等什么？

translation.en: Let's go see what's on John Baylor's front porch.
translation.zh: 赶紧去约翰贝勒的门前看看

translation.en: -Which one did you say it is? -I think it's across there.
translation.zh: -你刚才说是哪一间？-好像就在对面

translation.en: [Josh] So you're really sure about this, huh?
translation.zh: 你确定要过去一趟？

translation.en: -I just have a hunch. -A hunch that we're gonna get murdered?
translation.zh: -我只是有一种预感-预感告诉你我们会送命吗？

translation.en: It's broad daylight. What's the worst that could happen?
translation.zh: 大白天能出什么事？

translation.en: -Famous last words. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 这是经典的遗言

translation.en: Hi. John Baylor?
translation.zh: 嗨 请问你是约翰贝勒吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 我是

translation.en: I'm from Channel 12 News. Yeah, I know who you are.
translation.zh: -我是来自第12新闻频道的记者-我认识你

translation.en: You're the second surprise to show up on my front porch today.
translation.zh: 你是今天出现在我家门前的第二个惊喜

translation.en: By that, do you mean you also found a bag with a stack of cash in it?
translation.zh: 你是指你也收获了那个装满钞票的袋子吗？

translation.en: Yeah, it was--
translation.zh: 对 没错 你怎么知道的？

translation.en: Wait, how did you know? I just got home 20 minutes ago.
translation.zh: 对 没错 你怎么知道的？ 我才在20分钟前回到家

translation.en: We, um...
translation.zh: 我们…

translation.en: We're just that good. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我们就是这么在行

translation.en: Would you be willing to do an interview for the news?
translation.zh: 你介意接受访问吗？

translation.en: Yeah, but you'll want to talk to Sylvia.
translation.zh: 好啊 但你们肯定想和席薇亚谈谈

translation.en: Sylvia!
translation.zh: 席薇亚

translation.en: She's the reason why Good Sam chose us.
translation.zh: 因为她 我们才会中选

translation.en: -Honey. -Hi.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Hi, how are you?
translation.zh: 嗨 你好吗？

translation.en: I'm good. And you?
translation.zh: 我很好 你呢？

translation.en: -Good, thanks. -Would you guys like to come in?
translation.zh: -很好 谢谢你-你们要进来吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah, thank you.
translation.zh: 好啊 谢谢你

translation.en: [John] Right this way.
translation.zh: 往这边走

translation.en: [John] My wife is really sick.
translation.zh: 我太太病得很重

translation.en: There's a treatment, but, um, our insurance doesn't cover it.
translation.zh: 需要接受治疗 但保险公司不赔付

translation.en: So, my daughter, she said, "Daddy, can we make a video for Good Sam?"
translation.zh: 于是我女儿说：“爸 我们拍一段视频给‘好撒马利亚人’看如何？”

translation.en: And Sylvia, why did you decide you wanted to send a message to Good Sam?
translation.zh: 席薇亚 你怎么会想到拍视频向“好撒马利亚人”求助呢？

translation.en: [Sylvia] I wanted him to help my mommy.
translation.zh: 我希望他能帮助我妈

translation.en: [John] Then I made a video on my phone, and we posted it on the Channel 12 site.
translation.zh: 后来我用手机拍了这段视频然后上传到第12新闻频道官网

translation.en: Yeah, and I was on the news just like you.
translation.zh: 如今我和你一样上电视新闻了

translation.en: [Kate] That's right. You were.
translation.zh: 对啊 没错

translation.en: If Good Sam were watching right now, what would you like to say to him?
translation.zh: 假设“好撒马利亚人”正在看电视你有什么话想对他说呢？

translation.en: Good Sam...
translation.zh: “好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: you're giving us back some hope... some plans for our future, when...
translation.zh: 当我们以为失去希望和未来时你再次给了我们希望

translation.en: we really thought we were out of both.
translation.zh: 许了我们未来

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Thank you, Good Sam.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 “好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: We had to make sure the lead was legit before we brought it to you.
translation.zh: 我们总得确定消息真伪后才禀报你吧

translation.en: You're gonna run it, right? I mean, that kid. Like, come on.
translation.zh: 你会同意播出吧？你看那个孩子

translation.en: It's good, all right? It's good.
translation.zh: 好吧 行

translation.en: But this is Susan's story,
translation.zh: 可是这是苏珊负责的新闻

translation.en: and this is not gonna go over well with station management.
translation.zh: 电视台高层知道了肯定会不高兴

translation.en: David, we are the only station that has this story, for now.
translation.zh: 大卫 这是本台争取到的独家新闻

translation.en: All right, fine. I'll run it.
translation.zh: 好吧 我答应播出

translation.en: But in case I wasn't clear before,
translation.zh: 我再说清楚

translation.en: you get any more leads, you bring them to her.
translation.zh: 下一回获得任何新消息马上交给苏珊

translation.en: -Okay, but what if Good Sam doesn't-- -[David] Kate, Kate...
translation.zh: -但如果“好撒马利亚人”不想…-凯特

translation.en: Kate, please, just-- just do what I ask you. For once?
translation.zh: 凯特 拜托你了 照着我的话做就对了

translation.en: What are you looking at?
translation.zh: 看什么？

translation.en: He's fun.
translation.zh: 他真有趣

translation.en: -It was good. -It was good. It was very good.
translation.zh: -很好-很好 非常好

translation.en: My dad and I actually raced a boat here once. We took seventh place.
translation.zh: 我和我爸曾在这里参加过模型船比赛 还获得了第七名

translation.en: No kidding. I probably saw you there.
translation.zh: 说实话 我可能当初就见过你了

translation.en: When my brother and I weren't out sailing with my dad, we were here racing boats.
translation.zh: 我和我哥不是跟我爸一起扬帆出海 就是到这里参加模型船比赛

translation.en: We built our own models every winter to race the next summer.
translation.zh: 我们每年冬天制作模型船隔年夏天参加比赛

translation.en: -Wait, you built them? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -慢着 你们自己做模型船？-对啊

translation.en: Fancy.
translation.zh: 厉害

translation.en: Do you still sail?
translation.zh: 你现在还出海吗？

translation.en: Ah, no, not anymore.
translation.zh: 不了

translation.en: Um, so, tell me about kid Eric.
translation.zh: 我想了解小时候的艾瑞克

translation.en: Was he as obsessed with fire trucks as he was boats?
translation.zh: 他小时候迷恋消防车的程度 跟他迷恋帆船的程度一样吗？

translation.en: Well, yeah. Every kid dreams of being a firefighter.
translation.zh: 你懂的 每个小男孩都梦想当消防员

translation.en: I'm just one of the lucky grown-ups who got to be.
translation.zh: 我只是那个长大后有幸实现梦想的孩子

translation.en: I'm not sure everyone would describe a job
translation.zh: 每天冒着生命危险拯救陌生人的性命

translation.en: where you have to risk your life daily to save strangers as "lucky."
translation.zh: 不是所有人都会用“有幸”这个词来形容这种工作吧？

translation.en: All right. Maybe not lucky, then.
translation.zh: 那“有幸”这个词可能不合适

translation.en: Useful... works. I like knowing that I'm useful.
translation.zh: 就说是“有用”的工作吧我希望自己是个有用的人

translation.en: That and the ability to cook at work.
translation.zh: 既能工作 也能下厨

translation.en: Kid Eric also loved his toy kitchen.
translation.zh: 小时候的艾瑞克也很喜欢扮煮饭仔

translation.en: -Oh, really? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -是吗？-真的

translation.en: Nice.
translation.zh: 不错

translation.en: I mean, if you're free sometime this week, I'd love to cook you dinner.
translation.zh: 我是说 如果你这星期内有空的话 我希望能为你做一顿晚餐

translation.en: A home-cooked meal? I will not say no to that.
translation.zh: 在家做菜吃？我怎么拒绝得了呢？

translation.en: -[cell phone chimes] -Ooh, sorry.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: Everything okay?
translation.zh: 没什么事吧？

translation.en: Yeah, sorry. Um, it's just another text from Good Sam.
translation.zh: 不好意思“好撒马利亚人”又发短信来了

translation.en: Another text?
translation.zh: 又发短信给你？

translation.en: Yeah, he texted me yesterday with an address
translation.zh: 对啊 他昨天发短信给我说 他在阿斯托里亚某户人家门前留下一袋现金

translation.en: for the money that he left for a family in Astoria.
translation.zh: 他在阿斯托里亚某户人家门前留下一袋现金

translation.en: You didn't go, did you?
translation.zh: 你不会真的去了吧？

translation.en: Josh and I went. And the lead panned out. The money was there and everything.
translation.zh: 我和乔什一起去了 结果真有此事 钱和袋子都在

translation.en: What does this one say?
translation.zh: 短信内容是什么？

translation.en: Uh, "Now that you know I'm Good Sam,
translation.zh: “如今你知道我是‘好撒马利亚人’了

translation.en: meet me at nine tonight on level 5A of the parking lot at Center and White.
translation.zh: 今晚9点到白中心停车场5A层找我

translation.en: Come alone and don't bring cameras."
translation.zh: 只能自己一个人来 不准带摄影机”

translation.en: Why would he want a reporter to come alone without cameras?
translation.zh: 他为什么要一名记者不带摄影机单独去见他呢？

translation.en: Oh, I have met sources in some pretty sketchy places, trust me.
translation.zh: 我曾到过各种想像不到的地方跟线人见面 相信我

translation.en: Yeah, but still, somebody who gives away this kind of money
translation.zh: 可是这种捐出大笔钱的神秘人

translation.en: would either want to keep it completely quiet
translation.zh: 要不就完全匿名

translation.en: or meet you someplace safe for a proper interview.
translation.zh: 要不找个安全的地方接受正规访问

translation.en: I-I don't know, I don't trust this guy. I wouldn't go if I were you.
translation.zh: 说不上为什么 我不相信这个人我是你的话不会去

translation.en: But he's my story. I have to know who he is.
translation.zh: 可是他是我的新闻主角我必须知道他是谁

translation.en: And plus, he's changing things. I mean, he's making people want to help others.
translation.zh: 再说 他带来了改变他让人变得乐于助人

translation.en: All right. If you insist on meeting this Good Sam...
translation.zh: 好吧 既然你坚持去见这个“好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: at least let me come with you.
translation.zh: 至少让我陪你一起去吧

translation.en: Thanks, but I'll be fine.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 我自己应付得来

translation.en: Come on, let me do this.
translation.zh: 答应我 让我去吧

translation.en: He won't know, but I'll be there, making sure you're safe.
translation.zh: 他不会发现的我会躲在暗处保护你的安全

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧 谢谢你

translation.en: -[Eric] You all right? -[sighs]
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: [Eric] I'm here. I haven't taken my eyes off you for the past ten minutes.
translation.zh: 我到了 过去十分钟内我的眼睛一直没离开过你

translation.en: Um, I'm really glad you're here, wherever that is.
translation.zh: 很高兴你来了

translation.en: Look, don't worry, Kate. I won't let anything happen to you.
translation.zh: 放心吧 凯特 我不会让你出事的

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Uh... he's late.
translation.zh: 他迟到了

translation.en: I'm worried he's not gonna show at all.
translation.zh: 我担心他根本不会出现

translation.en: -Oh, hey, I think that's him. I gotta go. -Okay.
translation.zh: -等一下 好像是他 我挂了-好的

translation.en: Jack?
translation.zh: 杰克？

translation.en: Good Sam.
translation.zh: “好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: -Sorry I'm late. -Wait, you're Good Sam?
translation.zh: -抱歉 我迟到了-慢着 你就是“好撒马利亚人”？

translation.en: Why didn't you just come out and tell me?
translation.zh: 你怎么不直接告诉我呢？

translation.en: I can-- I can explain everything, just not here.
translation.zh: 我可以解释一切 但不是在这里

translation.en: -Can we go talk somewhere else? -Sure.
translation.zh: -可以到别处说话吗？-没问题

translation.en: -Hey! Is everything okay? -What the hell do you think you're doing?
translation.zh: -没事吧？-你他妈想干什么？

translation.en: [Kate] Oh, it's okay. Jack, this is Eric Hayes.
translation.zh: 没事的 杰克 这是艾瑞克赫士

translation.en: Kate, I asked you to come alone.
translation.zh: 凯特 我让你一个人来的

translation.en: Are you Good Sam?
translation.zh: -你是“好撒马利亚人”？-你只需要知道

translation.en: All you need to know is that she's completely safe with me.
translation.zh: -你是“好撒马利亚人”？-你只需要知道 她和我在一起绝对不会出事
