translation.en: It's okay. Jack's a friend of my dad's. I know him.
translation.zh: 没事的 杰克是我爸的朋友 我认识他

translation.en: All right, we gotta go. We're blocking this guy, so...
translation.zh: 我们该走了 车子挡着别人的路

translation.en: I'll call you.
translation.zh: 我会打给你的

translation.en: Eight's always been my lucky number,
translation.zh: “8”向来是我的幸运号码

translation.en: and on the eighth of this month, I made $800,000 on an investment.
translation.zh: 刚好这个月8日我有一笔投资赚了八十万美元

translation.en: Even I wasn't expecting it.
translation.zh: 连我自己也没料到

translation.en: So I figured if it just fell into my lap,
translation.zh: 我心想既然这笔钱从天而降

translation.en: why not someone else's?
translation.zh: 倒不如送给别人？

translation.en: And how did you choose the people you wanted to help?
translation.zh: 你怎么选择受益人？

translation.en: Like Christina Gomez.
translation.zh: 例如克里斯蒂娜戈麦斯

translation.en: I just kept my ears open.
translation.zh: 就留意周围的消息

translation.en: My assistant goes to church with Christina,
translation.zh: 我的助理和克里斯蒂娜来自同一个教会

translation.en: and then I saw Sylvia Baylor's video on your report.
translation.zh: 后来我透过你的报道了解到席薇亚贝勒的故事

translation.en: But why all the secrecy?
translation.zh: 那为什么一直隐藏身份呢？

translation.en: I mean, why not just give them the money and tell them who it's from?
translation.zh: 何不把钱送给他们后告诉他们你是谁？

translation.en: I didn't want the attention.
translation.zh: 我不想引人注目

translation.en: You know, that's why I hired someone to drop off the money.
translation.zh: 所以请人把钱放在他们家门前

translation.en: And what about the text messages to me?
translation.zh: 那后来为什么发短信给我？

translation.en: When I saw that they gave Susan Andrews your Good Sam story,
translation.zh: 我发现他们让苏珊安德鲁斯取代你处理“好撒马利亚人”的报道

translation.en: I thought if I got in touch with you directly,
translation.zh: 我认为如果能直接联络你

translation.en: then you could get your story back.
translation.zh: 可以帮你争回报道

translation.en: But now everyone's talking about Good Sam, and I keep expecting a reporter to...
translation.zh: 如今每个人都在谈论“好撒马利亚人”我每天都在担心有记者

translation.en: burst into my office with a camera crew.
translation.zh: 带着摄影队伍闯进我的办公室

translation.en: I'm in way over my head here, Kate.
translation.zh: 凯特 我现在如热锅上的蚂蚁

translation.en: I'm-- I'm kind of hoping that you can help me figure out...
translation.zh: 我希望你能帮我想想

translation.en: what to do next.
translation.zh: 接下来我能怎么做

translation.en: I think what you should do next is try to get ahead of the story.
translation.zh: 我认为你应该在被发现之前站出来公开你的身份

translation.en: You should let me interview you.
translation.zh: 接受我的访问吧

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: No, I really don't want to be a story.
translation.zh: 我真的不想上新闻

translation.en: Look, if you go public and tell people why you did this,
translation.zh: 如果你能公开身份告诉民众你做这件事的目的

translation.en: the story can go back to being about helping people,
translation.zh: 民众会把焦点放在怎么帮助人

translation.en: instead of this mystery around who is Good Sam.
translation.zh: 而不是不断猜测“好撒马利亚人”的真实身份 对吧？

translation.en: You really think that'll help? I do.
translation.zh: -你真的认为这么做会有帮助？-没错

translation.en: And I think it'll inspire people.
translation.zh: 我相信这么做能启发更多人

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Okay. -I trust you. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 好吧 我相信你

translation.en: Okay, great.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: I'll need proof, of course.
translation.zh: 但首先我需要证据

translation.en: Copies of the statements of the windfall you're talking about, withdrawals--
translation.zh: 我要你那笔横财的存款和提款证明副本

translation.en: Yeah, I'll, uh, email you everything tonight.
translation.zh: 我今晚就通过电邮传给你

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: I know who Good Sam is.
translation.zh: 我知道“好撒马利亚人”是谁了

translation.en: -Go on. -His name is Jack Hansen.
translation.zh: -你说吧-他叫杰克汉森

translation.en: He runs a hedge fund called Northern Lights Investments.
translation.zh: 是一家叫“北极光投资公司”的对冲基金经理

translation.en: He made about $800,000 last month on a stock deal no one else thought to make.
translation.zh: 他上个月通过某个股票交易意外赚进了八十万美元

translation.en: Says he decided to give it away.
translation.zh: 所以决定把钱捐给他人

translation.en: Got any solid evidence?
translation.zh: 有任何明确的证据吗？

translation.en: He's the one that gave me the tip about the money being at John Baylor's house.
translation.zh: 他告诉他怎么把钱送到约翰贝勒的家门前

translation.en: -Okay, but does that prove it's him? -No, but this might.
translation.zh: 不足以证明他是本人吧？ 没错 但这些文件倒有可能

translation.en: His financial records.
translation.zh: 上面是他的财务记录

translation.en: Look here.
translation.zh: 你看

translation.en: The day before this all started, before Christina Gomez found the money,
translation.zh: 在新闻播出前一天在克里斯蒂娜戈麦斯收到钱之前

translation.en: Jack Hansen withdrew $400,000 from his account, all at once.
translation.zh: 杰克汉森从银行户口中取出四十万美元

translation.en: Then here, again, the day before the fifth bag appears,
translation.zh: 后来在第五个袋子出现前一天

translation.en: Hansen withdraws another $400,000.
translation.zh: 汉森再取出四十万美元

translation.en: I mean, that's gotta be more than just a coincidence.
translation.zh: 这不太可能是巧合了吧

translation.en: That's what you said about the dead Realtor.
translation.zh: 那个死去的房产经纪你也是这么说他的

translation.en: Okay, but this time I'm sure I'm right.
translation.zh: 我知道 可是这回我非常确定

translation.en: David, he wants to give me an exclusive interview.
translation.zh: 大卫 他希望我能独家访问他

translation.en: Any evidence you didn't get from Hansen himself
translation.zh: 除了汉森本人提供的证据以外

translation.en: that you can corroborate with another source?
translation.zh: 你有没有找到其他可靠的证据？

translation.en: Other than the Baylor tip, no,
translation.zh: 除了贝勒的线索 没有其他了

translation.en: but if we wait, he could take the story elsewhere.
translation.zh: 可是如果我们再拖下去他可能会找其他媒体了

translation.en: Say yes and I will sit down with Hansen right away.
translation.zh: 只要你同意了 我就马上访问汉森

translation.en: I can't do it.
translation.zh: 我办不到

translation.en: Station management will come down on me hard
translation.zh: 如果这种大新闻不让苏珊报道

translation.en: if I go with you and not Susan for something this big.
translation.zh: 我担心电视台高层会怪罪下来

translation.en: You know what? This story is not just about Jack Hansen.
translation.zh: 你听好 这则新闻不仅关乎杰克汉森

translation.en: This story is about how Channel 12 was the first station to find Good Sam,
translation.zh: 也关乎第12新闻频道成为首家公布“好撒马利亚人”真实身份的电视台

translation.en: a man that everyone has been looking for.
translation.zh: 目前民众都在迫切寻找这位“好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: And I am the only one that can tell that story.
translation.zh: 只有我能告诉他们真相

translation.en: Jack, what inspired you to do this?
translation.zh: 杰克 是什么启发了你这么做？

translation.en: I wanted to help the workers.
translation.zh: 我想帮助劳工阶级

translation.en: Regular people who work two jobs to put a roof over their families' heads,
translation.zh: 为了让家人有个栖身之所而打两份工的普通人

translation.en: who pay taxes while living paycheck to paycheck.
translation.zh: 准时缴税 但每月月光

translation.en: They're working longer and harder these days and...
translation.zh: 如今工作时间越来越长工作量也越来越多

translation.en: they should not be forgotten.
translation.zh: 这些人不应该被遗忘

translation.en: So why come forward now?
translation.zh: 为什么选择现在公开身份？

translation.en: Um, many people were claiming to be me.
translation.zh: 近来许多人冒充我的身份

translation.en: I just wanted to set the record straight about what I wanted to accomplish.
translation.zh: 我想澄清我做这件事的真正目的

translation.en: And what is that?
translation.zh: 那你的目的是什么？

translation.en: I wanted to lend a hand in the best way that I could... to...
translation.zh: 我希望能尽我所能

translation.en: the soldiers in our everyday lives.
translation.zh: 帮助这些日常生活中的斗士

translation.en: The people who keep our factories open, who teach our kids in school.
translation.zh: 他们让工厂持续运转 在学校里教导我们的孩子

translation.en: Without those people... our city could not function.
translation.zh: 没有他们 这座城市可能动不起来

translation.en: And they deserve our support.
translation.zh: 他们值得我们帮助

translation.en: Thank you, Jack.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 杰克

translation.en: I've been speaking with Jack Hansen,
translation.zh: 刚才那位就是杰克汉森

translation.en: Manhattan hedge fund manager who says he's Good Sam,
translation.zh: 来自曼哈顿的一名对冲基金经理他说他就是“好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: the man behind the anonymous cash gifts being left on New York City doorsteps.
translation.zh: 之前不断送钱到纽约市住户门前的神秘好心人

translation.en: Over to you, Chuck.
translation.zh: 把时间交还给你 查克

translation.en: [woman] And we're out.
translation.zh: 收工

translation.en: So did you get, uh, everything you wanted?
translation.zh: 该有的都有了吧？

translation.en: Oh, yeah. You couldn't have been better.
translation.zh: 没错 你表现得太好了

translation.en: So I just got off the phone with the network,
translation.zh: 我刚跟新闻网的人通过电话

translation.en: and they want a special report for their national broadcast.
translation.zh: 他们希望能为全国新闻做一个特别报道

translation.en: The story's going national tonight?
translation.zh: 这则新闻今晚会在全国播出？

translation.en: Yep. Uh, you better lay low
translation.zh: 没错 你最好保持低调

translation.en: because, come six o'clock tonight, you're gonna be a very famous man.
translation.zh: 因为傍晚6点过后 你将会成为大红人

translation.en: Ah, I'll make sure to enjoy my remaining anonymity.
translation.zh: 我会好好享受所剩不多的安稳

translation.en: This is a great thing you're doing here, Jack.
translation.zh: 你做得很好 杰克

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Wow. Uh, okay. I'm not ready for this day to be over.
translation.zh: 天啊 我不想今天就这样结束

translation.en: What do you think about grabbing something to eat?
translation.zh: 要不要出去吃点东西？

translation.en: Sure. But you should keep a low profile tonight, like David said.
translation.zh: 好啊 可是你今晚应该保持低调就像大卫说的

translation.en: Do you know anywhere kind of out of the spotlight?
translation.zh: 你知道有什么地方可以避开眼目吗？

translation.en: I know just the place.
translation.zh: 我知道有个地方

translation.en: -Great. -[elevator bell dings]
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: Oh, wow.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Our interview aired 15 minutes ago and we're already over 10,000 hits.
translation.zh: 访问15分钟前播出至今已经吸引了超过一万个点击

translation.en: Are you surprised?
translation.zh: 没料到吗？

translation.en: -You're a great interviewer. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -你是个很棒的主持人-谢谢

translation.en: Okay, ready for the best Mexican food in Manhattan?
translation.zh: 准备好享用曼哈顿最好吃的墨西哥餐了吗？

translation.en: Yes, I am.
translation.zh: 准备好了

translation.en: Oh, shoot. Channel 9's here. We should go.
translation.zh: 完了 第九新闻频道的采访队来了我们快走吧

translation.en: -We should go out the back. -Jack Hansen! Good Sam!
translation.zh: -我们朝后门走-杰克汉森 “好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: Who are you gonna give the money to next?
translation.zh: 你下一回打算把钱送给谁？

translation.en: Um... I'm gonna make this brief. I want to help the workers.
translation.zh: 我就长话短说吧 我想帮助劳工阶级

translation.en: Uh, regular people who work two jobs to put a roof over their families' heads,
translation.zh: 为了让家人有个栖身之所而打两份工的普通人

translation.en: who pay taxes while living paycheck to paycheck.
translation.zh: 准时缴税 但每月月光

translation.en: They're working longer and harder these days, and...
translation.zh: 如今他们工作的时间越来越长工作量也越来越多

translation.en: they should not be forgotten.
translation.zh: 这些人不应该被遗忘

translation.en: -Are you going to be giving again? -No more questions.
translation.zh: -你还会送钱吗？-到此为止

translation.en: That was, uh... unexpected.
translation.zh: 真没想到

translation.en: Yeah, no kidding. How did they know where to find us?
translation.zh: 是啊 不是开玩笑的他们怎么找到我们的？

translation.en: Someone must have followed us from the station.
translation.zh: 肯定是有人从电视台一路跟踪我们

translation.en: Looks like we're not gonna able to stop people from talking about Good Sam.
translation.zh: 看来我们阻止不了人们继续谈论“好撒马利亚人”了

translation.en: I guess not.
translation.zh: 我想是吧

translation.en: You know, I noticed that what you told the reporters
translation.zh: 对了 我发现你刚才跟记者说的话

translation.en: was almost word for word what you said in our interview.
translation.zh: 跟你接受我访问时说的话几乎一摸一样

translation.en: -Really? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -是吗？-嗯

translation.en: Guess I rehearsed too much last night.
translation.zh: 可能是我昨晚练习太多次了

translation.en: Probably over-prepared for our interview.
translation.zh: 为了接受访问 我做足了准备可能做得也太多了

translation.en: I'm glad I did, though. -You were phenomenal. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 我很高兴自己办到了你是个非常出色的记者

translation.en: I think, uh... I think you're gonna be able to leverage this story for... whatever you want.
translation.zh: 我想你可以利用这则报道去做其他你想做的事

translation.en: Anchor, network, write your ticket.
translation.zh: 当上新闻主播、上新闻网要求加薪什么的

translation.en: That's not what I want out of this story.
translation.zh: 我报道这则新闻不是为了这些

translation.en: Okay. Well, uh...
translation.zh: 原来如此 那…

translation.en: what, um... what do you want then?
translation.zh: 那你要的是什么？

translation.en: Why were you looking for me, for Good Sam?
translation.zh: 为什么要找我这个“好撒马利亚人”？

translation.en: Because he's...
translation.zh: 因为他…

translation.en: You are exactly what I didn't think existed.
translation.zh: 因为我以为你这样的人根本不存在

translation.en: Someone doing good, expecting nothing in return.
translation.zh: 世界上没有这种做好事不图回报的人

translation.en: I'm... glad you found me then.
translation.zh: 我很高兴你找到我了

translation.en: Oh, um...
translation.zh: 这…

translation.en: That's not what I meant. I...
translation.zh: 我没有这个意思 我…

translation.en: Sorry, I...
translation.zh: 对不起 我…

translation.en: I thought that, um... -there was a spark between us. -No, no, there was, but...
translation.zh: -我以为我们之间有火花-之前是有 但如今…

translation.en: you're my story now.
translation.zh: 你已经成了我的新闻

translation.en: Look, it's been a long day.
translation.zh: 我累了 可以送我回家吗？

translation.en: -Would you mind just taking me home? -Yeah. Of course.
translation.zh: 我累了 可以送我回家吗？ 当然可以

translation.en: Let's, uh... Let's hop on the bridge.
translation.zh: 上桥吧

translation.en: -[driver] Mm-hmm. -Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Kate] Hey. I, um... I've been texting you but hadn't heard back yet.
translation.zh: 嗨 我一直发短信给你可是没收到你的回复

translation.en: Sorry, it's been a... -Been a rough shift. -Oh.
translation.zh: -不好意思 当班有点忙-原来如此

translation.en: And I was a little thrown the other night when your Good Sam showed up.
translation.zh: 那晚你要找的“好撒马利亚人”出现后我有点吓着了

translation.en: Yeah. No, I was as surprised as you.
translation.zh: 对啊 我和你一样惊讶

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Thought he was your father's friend.
translation.zh: 他不是你父亲的朋友吗？

translation.en: And I, uh, saw him leading you out of a restaurant last night on Channel 9.
translation.zh: 第九新闻频道播出他带你离开一家餐厅的片段

translation.en: Well, he's the subject of my story.
translation.zh: 他是我的采访对象

translation.en: [woman] Anybody want a coffee? I'm going.
translation.zh: 谁要咖啡？我出去买

translation.en: I'd say you've got your hands full.
translation.zh: 我看你是太忙了

translation.en: Well, are we still on for dinner tomorrow night?
translation.zh: 明晚的晚餐约定没取消吧？

translation.en: I'll text you.
translation.zh: 我再给你发短信

translation.en: Come on, guys. Get a move on!
translation.zh: 兄弟们 赶紧行动

translation.en: [man] Hustle, hustle, hustle!
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: [Eric] Let's go. Come on!
translation.zh: 走吧 快点

translation.en: [woman] Moving out!
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: Oh, my God, look. You have to see this.
translation.zh: 天啊 你一定要看看

translation.en: National News Dispatch, New York Daily View,
translation.zh: 《全国新闻放送》《纽约每日观察》

translation.en: and don't even get me started on your emails.
translation.zh: 更别说你的电子邮箱

translation.en: Your interview has over a million views online.
translation.zh: 你那段访问的网络点击已经超过一百万了

translation.en: -I'm sorry, did you say a million? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你说什么？一百万？-没错

translation.en: -Well done, Kate. Good job. -All right, people. Listen up.
translation.zh: -好样的 凯特 做得好-各位同事 听好

translation.en: Last night's interview with Good Sam
translation.zh: 昨晚播出“好撒马利亚人”的独家访问后

translation.en: got us the highest ratings in the station's history.
translation.zh: 本台创下了史上最高收视率

translation.en: Thanks to Kate, who got the interview
translation.zh: 这都要感谢凯特成功争取到

translation.en: that every station and every network, I might add, was trying to get.
translation.zh: 每家电视台和新闻网正在极力争取的独家访问

translation.en: And the story keeps growing.
translation.zh: 新闻持续发展

translation.en: Lauren, tell her about the call we got from Washington Heights.
translation.zh: 劳伦 告诉她那通从华盛顿高地打来的电话

translation.en: A woman called to say she started an Anonymous Good Samaritan Club.
translation.zh: 有个人打来说她刚创立了一个叫“好撒马利亚人”的俱乐部

translation.en: They'll be following Good Sam's philosophy.
translation.zh: 团队会遵循“好撒马利亚人”的原则

translation.en: They've already bought a wheelchair for a veteran in their neighborhood.
translation.zh: 他们已经为住在附近的一名退伍军人买了轮椅

translation.en: And some guy in line at the grocery store in Staten Island
translation.zh: 有人在史丹顿岛的某家杂货店内

translation.en: anonymously paid for the next ten people.
translation.zh: 为后面的十位购物者买单

translation.en: -Wow. -Kate, see if you can get Hansen
translation.zh: -天啊-你试着安排汉森

translation.en: -to talk on camera to people he helped. -Sure.
translation.zh: 在镜头前跟受益人对话

translation.en: Lauren, give me man-in-the-street-type interviews.
translation.zh: -没问题-劳伦 你去做街访

translation.en: Ed, see if you can get some reaction from workers on Good Sam's philosophy.
translation.zh: 艾德 你去了解劳工阶级对“好撒马利亚人”助人原则的看法

translation.en: This is our time, people.
translation.zh: 各位 这是我们发光发热的时候

translation.en: Let's take this story higher, huh?
translation.zh: 让我们继续炒热这则新闻

translation.en: Yeah! Woo!
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: Guys, look! It's Good Sam.
translation.zh: 你们看 是那位“好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: [Christina] Good Sam!
translation.zh: 好撒马利亚人

translation.en: Don't worry. You're gonna be great.
translation.zh: 放心吧 不会有事的

translation.en: [Jack] Christina.
translation.zh: 克里斯蒂娜

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Oh, Good Sam.
translation.zh: 是“好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: Oh.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: I can't thank you enough for what you did for my family.
translation.zh: 你为我家人所做的一切 我感激不尽

translation.en: But how did you know we needed help?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道我们需要帮助呢？

translation.en: [Jack] I had a system for finding out who was in need.
translation.zh: 我有个系统能找出那些有需要的人

translation.en: Uh, Jack, you said that you knew about Christina's situation
translation.zh: 杰克 你说是因为你的助理

translation.en: because your assistant attends her church.
translation.zh: 跟她来自同一个教会你从她那边打听到的

translation.en: Oh, who is it? I want to thank her.
translation.zh: 这个人是谁？我要亲自感谢她

translation.en: Carla...
translation.zh: 卡尔拉

translation.en: Muñoz. Um...
translation.zh: 穆诺兹

translation.en: Long dark hair, brown eyes.
translation.zh: 蓄着一头长黑发 褐色眼睛

translation.en: She said that your faith, uh, inspired her.
translation.zh: 她说你的信念激励了她

translation.en: -[cell phone chimes and vibrates] -Oh.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Uh, Kate, are we just about wrapped up here?
translation.zh: 凯特 能不能就拍到这里？

translation.en: I'm late for a meeting.
translation.zh: 我要出席会议 快迟到了

translation.en: I just have a couple more questions.
translation.zh: 我还有几个问题

translation.en: It's gonna have to wait, unfortunately.
translation.zh: 不好意思 要等下一回了

translation.en: Sorry, Christina.
translation.zh: 抱歉 克里斯蒂娜

translation.en: -We're done? -Uh, yeah. Thanks, Christina.
translation.zh: -结束了？-是的 谢谢你 克里斯蒂娜

translation.en: Hey, is everything okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吧？

translation.en: Uh, yeah, yeah. Uh...
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: I'm headed to Senator Wintour's party tonight. I'll see you there?
translation.zh: 我今晚会出席温特参议员主办的晚宴 你也会去吗？

translation.en: Oh, um, I wasn't planning on it. My dad's in DC.
translation.zh: 我本来没打算去 我爸在华盛顿

translation.en: Still, he's a family friend, right? And I'm going there.
translation.zh: 他也算是你爸的朋友吧？我今晚会出席

translation.en: It'll be fun.
translation.zh: 很好玩的

translation.en: Okay, I'll think about it.
translation.zh: 我考虑看看

translation.en: Thanks. Don't know how he'll get through meetings
translation.zh: -谢谢你-大家都在谈论“好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: when all anyone's talking about is Good Sam.
translation.zh: 他要怎么开会啊？

translation.en: Something was off with Jack today.
translation.zh: 杰克今天有点不对劲

translation.en: Well, it's a lot to take in.
translation.zh: 可能忙透了吧

translation.en: One day, he's managing a hedge fund, the next, he's on the national news.
translation.zh: 之前他是对冲基金经理如今却成了全国新闻人物

translation.en: Still, though...
translation.zh: 但我依然觉得

translation.en: He seemed incredibly uncomfortable around Christina.
translation.zh: 他在克里斯蒂娜面前表现得很不自在

translation.en: Maybe he felt awkward.
translation.zh: 可能他觉得尴尬吧

translation.en: He just gave the woman $100,000. What's there to feel awkward about?
translation.zh: 他给了那个女人十万美元有什么好尴尬的？

translation.en: Yeah, well, when I give someone $100,000, I'll let you know.
translation.zh: 我哪天送人十万美元就回答你这个问题

translation.en: Fair enough.
translation.zh: 也行

translation.en: [Jack] I wanted to lend a hand in the best way that I could...
translation.zh: 我希望能尽我所能

translation.en: to the people who keep our factories open...
translation.zh: 帮助让工厂持续运转的人

translation.en: who fix our cars and our plumbing...
translation.zh: 这些为我们修车和修水管的人

translation.en: who bake our bread...
translation.zh: 这些为我们做面包的人

translation.en: How many times are you gonna watch the Good Sam interview you did with Jack Hansen?
translation.zh: 你到底想重复看你和杰克汉森的访问视频多少遍？

translation.en: As many times as it takes for me to figure this thing out.
translation.zh: 越多遍越好 直到我找出其中的蹊跷

translation.en: He's up to something. I just don't know what it is yet.
translation.zh: 我觉得他有预谋 只是我还查不出来

translation.en: Here, watch this.
translation.zh: 你看

translation.en: -I wanted to... -As Good Sam... -...help the workers. -...I want to help the workers.
translation.zh: 我想帮助劳工阶级

translation.en: [both] Regular people who work two jobs to put a roof over their families' heads.
translation.zh: 为了让家人有个栖身之所而打两份工的普通人

translation.en: Who pay taxes while living paycheck to paycheck...
translation.zh: 准时缴税 但每月月光

translation.en: Look, the soundbites are near perfect.
translation.zh: 说词几乎一摸一样

translation.en: It's almost too polished.
translation.zh: 好像经过粉饰似的

translation.en: Yeah, you're right. Solid delivery, too.
translation.zh: 你说得对 他表现得毫无瑕疵

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -[both] They should not be forgotten.
translation.zh: -没错-这些人不应该被遗忘

translation.en: [Kate] Yet, some of the people you helped weren't needy or poor.
translation.zh: 有些受益人并不需要钱也不是穷人…

translation.en: -Can you do me a favor? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -可以帮我一个忙吗？-你说吧

translation.en: Will you please tell David that I am chasing a lead at an event tonight?
translation.zh: 帮我转告大卫说我今晚会出席一项活动追踪线索

translation.en: Tonight? Why are you leaving now?
translation.zh: 今晚？怎么现在就走？

translation.en: Ah, because it's black tie,
translation.zh: 是正装晚宴

translation.en: which means I probably should've started getting ready two hours ago.
translation.zh: 我早就该开始梳妆打扮了

translation.en: -Right. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -好吧-谢谢你

translation.en: [Kate] I know. I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: David, I'm sorry I bailed on work, but I can't tell you where I am right now.
translation.zh: 大卫 抱歉我翘班了可是我不能告诉你我现在在哪里

translation.en: At least, not just yet.
translation.zh: 至少暂时不行

translation.en: But I promise you, no other reporter is with Good Sam tonight.
translation.zh: 但我能保证 今晚只有我一个记者待在好撒马利亚人身边

translation.en: Okay. I'll call you later.
translation.zh: 好的 我待会儿再打给你

translation.en: Hi. My name is Kate Bradley. I'm Ashok Bradley's daughter.
translation.zh: 你好 我是凯特布莱德利 是阿硕克布莱德利参议员的女儿

translation.en: -Sorry, I don't see you on the list. -Um...
translation.zh: 抱歉 宾客名单上没有你的名字

translation.en: Could you just tell Senator Wintour I'm here, please?
translation.zh: 可以麻烦你告诉温特参议员说我到了吗？

translation.en: This is a private party.
translation.zh: 这是私人宴会

translation.en: -Kate! -Hi!
translation.zh: -凯特-你好

translation.en: What a surprise! I didn't know you were coming.
translation.zh: 太意外了 我不知道你会来

translation.en: -It's okay. -May I take your things?
translation.zh: -没关系-要我帮你收起来吗？

translation.en: Please. Thanks.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢你

translation.en: Come in.
translation.zh: 进来吧

translation.en: It was a last-minute decision. I hope you don't mind.
translation.zh: 我是临时才决定出席的希望你不介意

translation.en: -No. -It's so nice to see you, Tom.
translation.zh: -没关系-汤姆 我很高兴见到你

translation.en: So, listen, you know Ashok's not here, right?
translation.zh: 你知道阿硕克没来吧？

translation.en: No, I know. He's still in DC.
translation.zh: 我知道 我爸在华盛顿

translation.en: Um, I'm actually not here to see him. I'm-- I'm looking for Jack Hansen.
translation.zh: 我来其实不是为了见他我是来找杰克汉森的

translation.en: Okay, so... you know about the big announcement, then?
translation.zh: 那你肯定听说过他将做出一项重大宣布吧？

translation.en: Uh... big announcement?
translation.zh: 重大宣布？

translation.en: I'll let him tell you.
translation.zh: 我让他亲自告诉你吧

translation.en: -Look, he's around here somewhere, so... -I'll find him.
translation.zh: -他就在附近-我自己找找看

translation.en: -Nice to see you. -Nice to see you.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你

translation.en: Thank you so, so much.
translation.zh: 十分感谢你们

translation.en: Wow, this is the best surprise of the evening. You look astonishing.
translation.zh: 天啊 这是今晚最大的惊喜你看起来太好看了

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: I'm, uh, happy you made it after all.
translation.zh: 很高兴你来了

translation.en: Me, too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Hey, so, what's this big announcement that Tom told me about?
translation.zh: 汤姆说你要做出重大宣布请问是什么事？

translation.en: Oh. I'm, uh...
translation.zh: 对了 我打算…

translation.en: I'm running for Congress.
translation.zh: 我打算参选国会议员

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Um...
translation.zh: 这…

translation.en: -When did you decide this? -Uh...
translation.zh: 你什么时候决定的？

translation.en: A group of businessmen approached me and... convinced me to run.
translation.zh: 有一群企业家找我 然后说服我参选

translation.en: So, wait. Um... In our interview, when you were talking about the workers,
translation.zh: 慢着 你接受访问时针对劳工阶级所说的话

translation.en: the ones who live paycheck to paycheck, that was...
translation.zh: 他们每月月光

translation.en: What? That was your campaign statement?
translation.zh: 全都是你的竞选宣言？

translation.en: Kate, no. I-I believe everything that I said.
translation.zh: 凯特 不是的我所说的话都是发自内心的

translation.en: It's why I gave away that money. It's why I'm running for Congress.
translation.zh: 所以我才把钱送出去这也是我参选国会议员的原因

translation.en: So... how do you explain the gift to Marie?
translation.zh: 那你怎么解释那笔送给玛丽的钱？

translation.en: Uh... Marie?
translation.zh: 玛丽？

translation.en: Yeah, she's the oncologist who works at Parkland Hospital.
translation.zh: 那个帕克兰医院的肿瘤科医生

translation.en: Lives in a three-million-dollar house in Fort Greene.
translation.zh: 住在格林堡的一座三百万豪宅里

translation.en: Not exactly one of the workers that you claim to want to help.
translation.zh: 她绝对不属于你想帮助的劳工阶级

translation.en: Yeah, but, um... she-- she also... uh, is on a number of charitable boards,
translation.zh: 对 可是她是几个慈善机构的董事会成员 所以我…

translation.en: and I... I just had this feeling, like,
translation.zh: 对 可是她是几个慈善机构的董事会成员 所以我… 我相信她会善用那笔钱结果她的确没让我失望

translation.en: she would do something good with it, and she did.
translation.zh: 我相信她会善用那笔钱结果她的确没让我失望

translation.en: Look, Kate, I know that you're not a big fan of the political world,
translation.zh: 凯特 你听我说我知道你不喜欢政治圈

translation.en: but your dad's given me his full support.
translation.zh: 不过你爸非常支持我参选

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -是吗？-真的

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Willing or not, you sure have figured out a way
translation.zh: 无论我愿不愿意相信你肯定早已经想好

translation.en: to get the Bradleys involved in your big plan.
translation.zh: 怎么把我们布莱德利家拉进你的政治宏图中

translation.en: Look, um...
translation.zh: 你听我说

translation.en: I'm gonna make a formal announcement on Friday,
translation.zh: 星期五 我将会正式宣布

translation.en: and I'd love to give you an exclusive interview.
translation.zh: 到时我很乐意让你独家访问我

translation.en: But, until then, can we keep this between me and you?
translation.zh: 但在那之前你可以暂且不说出去吗？

translation.en: Sure. Why not?
translation.zh: 好啊 小事

translation.en: [Wintour] Well, there you two are.
translation.zh: 原来你们在这里

translation.en: Kate, I've put you and Jack at our table.
translation.zh: 凯特 我让你和杰克坐在同一张桌子

translation.en: Candace wants to catch up on everything you're doing.
translation.zh: 坎迪斯想知道你最近在忙些什么 好啊

translation.en: You heard the big news?
translation.zh: 收到重大消息了吧？

translation.en: Indeed I did, and been promised an exclusive interview.
translation.zh: 是啊 有人答应会给我做独家访问

translation.en: Jack, the 12th District's a real coveted seat.
translation.zh: 杰克 第12区是个炙手可热的席位

translation.en: And I think his idea of protecting the workers of this city
translation.zh: 他倡议为这座城市的劳工阶级争取权益

translation.en: is gonna be a real breath of fresh air.
translation.zh: 我相信这会是一股清流

translation.en: Jack, my boy, come with me. There's somebody I want you to meet.
translation.zh: 杰克 跟我走一趟我想介绍几个人给你认识

translation.en: David, I've got something.
translation.zh: 大卫 我获得了一些情报

translation.en: Jack Hansen is running for Congress in the 12th District.
translation.zh: 杰克汉森将参选第12区国会议员席位

translation.en: -No kidding? -I'd vote for him, for sure.
translation.zh: -你不是在开玩笑吧？-我肯定会投票给他

translation.en: [David] How do you know this?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道的？

translation.en: I, uh... I crashed a party at Senator Wintour's house last night.
translation.zh: 我昨晚闯入了温特参议员主办的晚宴

translation.en: He could give the incumbent a run, now that Hansen's a name people know.
translation.zh: 现任议员惨了毕竟汉森已经成了家喻户晓的名字

translation.en: Yeah, thanks to us.
translation.zh: 对啊 这都是我们的功劳

translation.en: He's running on a public image that we created for him.
translation.zh: 他利用我们为他打造的公关形象做竞选宣传

translation.en: It was never actual news.
translation.zh: “好撒马利亚人”根本不是新闻

translation.en: Just a performance by yet another ambitious politician.
translation.zh: 只是一个野心勃勃的政客的宣传舞台

translation.en: Well, at least Jack Hansen's trying to help people. We could do worse.
translation.zh: 至少杰克汉森想要帮助人也不是太糟糕啦

translation.en: [scoffs] Don't you get it?
translation.zh: 你们还不明白吗？

translation.en: He used us.
translation.zh: 我们被利用了

translation.en: -[cell phone vibrates] -Keep digging.
translation.zh: 继续挖掘真相

translation.en: Sorry, guys.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: Hey, Dad. Thanks for calling me back.
translation.zh: 爸 很高兴你回电了

translation.en: [Ashok] My assistant said it was urgent.
translation.zh: 我的助理说你有急事找我

translation.en: It is. Jack just told me he's running for Congress.
translation.zh: 的确是急事杰克刚告诉我他打算参选国会议员

translation.en: I thought you said it was urgent. I left a Senate Finance Committee meeting.
translation.zh: 我还以为是什么急事所以匆匆离开了参议院财政委员会议

translation.en: [Kate] Dad, please.
translation.zh: 爸 别生气

translation.en: I need to know when Jack decided to run.
translation.zh: 我只想知道杰克从什么时候开始决定参选的

translation.en: When hasn't he talked about running for office?
translation.zh: 他没有一刻不谈参选的事 不是吗？

translation.en: Was it the 12th District?
translation.zh: 好像是第12区吧？

translation.en: I remember a while back, he asked if he had a shot.
translation.zh: 我记得前阵子他还问我他有没有机会呢

translation.en: And what? You said yes?
translation.zh: 结果你说什么？有机会？

translation.en: Are you backing him?
translation.zh: 你支持他参选？

translation.en: Well, actually, at the time, I said no.
translation.zh: 其实我当时说他没机会

translation.en: The people who'd had that position were always household names,
translation.zh: 那个选区的国会议员都是家喻户晓的人物

translation.en: and Jack really didn't have that.
translation.zh: 杰克没有那种名气

translation.en: Not yet, anyway.
translation.zh: 那时还没有

translation.en: Not until he created Good Sam to get everyone's attention.
translation.zh: 如今他打造出“好撒马利亚人”的形象成为众人的焦点了

translation.en: Well, you can't really fault him for taking advantage of notoriety.
translation.zh: 不过你也不能完全怪他造势宣传

translation.en: And, as a Congressional candidate,
translation.zh: 再说作为一个国会议员候选人

translation.en: maybe he can take this generosity movement and... make some real change with it.
translation.zh: 或许他的善举真的能带来改变也说不定

translation.en: Dad, it's manipulative.
translation.zh: 爸 他这是操控啊

translation.en: Can't you see that?
translation.zh: 你看不出来吗？

translation.en: All right. Listen, I-I gotta go. I'll, um... I'll call you later.
translation.zh: 我要挂了 我待会儿再打给你

translation.en: -[Eric] You all done? -[Kate] Yes.
translation.zh: -都吃完了？-对

translation.en: Hey, sit. I got it.
translation.zh: 你坐下 我来处理

translation.en: Okay, thanks.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢你

translation.en: You weren't lying, by the way. You are a really good cook.
translation.zh: 果然没骗人 你的厨艺的确非常出色

translation.en: Well, you know, you pick up a thing or two cooking for the guys at the fire station.
translation.zh: 在消防局工作总能从同事身上学会几道料理

translation.en: Listen, I think I made some assumptions about you and Jack.
translation.zh: 你听我说我以为你和杰克是情侣关系

translation.en: And, um, I hope I misread some things.
translation.zh: 希望是我误会了

translation.en: Jack is just my interview subject.
translation.zh: 杰克只是我的访问对象

translation.en: And it turns out you were right not to trust him.
translation.zh: 还有你说得对 这个人信不过

translation.en: He's running for Congress.
translation.zh: 他即将参选国会议员

translation.en: He launched a political career after coming forward as Good Sam.
translation.zh: 他宣布自己就是“好撒马利亚人”后随即展开他的政治宏图

translation.en: [Kate] Exactly.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Just further proof that no one does anything good without expecting something in return.
translation.zh: 进一步证明了世界上没有做好事不求回报的人

translation.en: I like to think that's not true.
translation.zh: 我倒不认同

translation.en: -Coffee? -Ooh, yeah. Thanks.
translation.zh: -要不要来杯咖啡？-好啊 谢谢

translation.en: So did you fix this place up yourself?
translation.zh: 这个公寓是你自己动手装修的吗？

translation.en: Because, man, it's amazing.
translation.zh: 天啊 太好看了

translation.en: [Eric] Yeah. It's a work in progress.
translation.zh: 对啊 还没做好

translation.en: Is this you captaining this beautiful sailboat?
translation.zh: 你是这艘帆船的船长吗？

translation.en: Yeah. That's when me and my brother took the crew up to a friend's place in Maine.
translation.zh: 对啊 这是我和我哥带着船员 出海前往缅因州找朋友时拍下的照片

translation.en: Camden Harbor.
translation.zh: 这是卡姆登港

translation.en: -Is this Patrick? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -这位就是帕特里克？-没错

translation.en: He was always the first one on the boat and the last one off.
translation.zh: 他向来是第一个上船最后一个下船的人

translation.en: Everyone called him Fish.
translation.zh: 我们都叫他“鱼哥”

translation.en: Hmm, Fish.
translation.zh: 鱼哥 那你有什么外号？

translation.en: -Did you have a nickname? -Hawkins.
translation.zh: 鱼哥 那你有什么外号？ 霍金斯

translation.en: Like the kid from Treasure Island.
translation.zh: 小说《金银岛》中的人物

translation.en: Hawkins. I like that.
translation.zh: 霍金斯 我很喜欢

translation.en: And who's that?
translation.zh: 那这个人是谁？

translation.en: Um, just a friend of my brother's.
translation.zh: 我哥的朋友

translation.en: So is this what dinner's always like with a reporter? All the questions.
translation.zh: 记者吃晚餐都爱问许多问题吗？

translation.en: Pretty much. When was the last time you went sailing?
translation.zh: 差不多 你上一回扬帆出海是什么时候的事了？

translation.en: Come on. That wasn't a hard one, was it?
translation.zh: 这个问题不难回答吧？

translation.en: Not since Patrick died.
translation.zh: 帕特里克过世之前

translation.en: It just hasn't felt right without him.
translation.zh: 没有他在总觉得不对劲

translation.en: I'm sorry. I-I didn't realize.
translation.zh: 对不起 我不知道

translation.en: Do you mind if I ask what happened?
translation.zh: 介意告诉我发生了什么事吗？

translation.en: Ah, you don't wanna hear about that.
translation.zh: 你不会想知道的

translation.en: I'm listening, if you want to tell me.
translation.zh: 如果你愿意说的话 我洗耳恭听

translation.en: My brother and I went sailing in May for my birthday.
translation.zh: 5月中旬 我和我哥出海庆祝我的生日

translation.en: And he was so excited...
translation.zh: 他当时发现了一条新航线

translation.en: about this new route that he'd planned out and...
translation.zh: 感到非常兴奋他决定带我一起去探索

translation.en: and the surprise he had for me when we got there.
translation.zh: 也在目的地为我准备了惊喜

translation.en: And the weather was perfect.
translation.zh: 出发时天气晴朗

translation.en: Sun in the sky, a few clouds.
translation.zh: 艳阳高照 只有几朵白云

translation.en: And then the wind just picked up,
translation.zh: 途中突然刮起了大风

translation.en: and all of a sudden...
translation.zh: 就在那一瞬间

translation.en: this wall of water just came toward us.
translation.zh: 一个大浪向我们袭来

translation.en: And the boom swung loose and...
translation.zh: 帆桁塌了下来

translation.en: hit Patrick in the head, knocked us both overboard.
translation.zh: 击中了帕特里克的头部我们俩都掉进海里

translation.en: I had to fight through the swell to get to him.
translation.zh: 我拼尽全力 在汹涌的大浪中抓住他

translation.en: And he was unconscious,
translation.zh: 他当时昏迷不醒

translation.en: and bleeding a lot.
translation.zh: 也流了很多血

translation.en: I tried CPR, but...
translation.zh: 我试着为他做心脏复苏术 可是…

translation.en: I lost him.
translation.zh: 依然救不活他

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 十分抱歉

translation.en: You see, I'm not the hero everyone thinks I am.
translation.zh: 我并不是人人眼中的英雄

translation.en: I couldn't even save my own brother.
translation.zh: 我连自己的哥哥也救不了

translation.en: Hey, you did everything you could.
translation.zh: 可是你已经尽力了

translation.en: You risked your life to save him.
translation.zh: 你冒着生命危险去救他

translation.en: You do that every single day.
translation.zh: 你天天都在冒险救人

translation.en: You may not think you're a hero...
translation.zh: 或许你不认为自己是英雄

translation.en: but I do.
translation.zh: 但在我眼里你是

translation.en: Hey, Stephanie. It's Kate from Channel 12 trying you again.
translation.zh: 你好 史蒂芬妮又是那个来自第12新闻频道的凯特

translation.en: Can you please call me back when you get a chance? Thanks.
translation.zh: 你有空的时候可以打给我吗？谢谢

translation.en: Hey, look at this. There's a hidden column in the spreadsheet. A note section.
translation.zh: 你们看看这表格上有个隐藏备注栏目

translation.en: -[Kate] Anything interesting? -[Lauren] Um...
translation.zh: 有什么特别吗？

translation.en: On the first 400-grand withdrawal from Jack, there's some initials.
translation.zh: 杰克的账单上第一笔四十万美元的取款旁有缩写

translation.en: PDD. Is that one of the people who got money?
translation.zh: “PDD”是受益人的姓名简写吗？

translation.en: -Mmm, no. No one has the initials PDD. -[cell phone vibrates]
translation.zh: 不是 没有这个名字

translation.en: Hey, Stephanie. Thanks for calling me back.
translation.zh: 你好 史蒂芬妮 很高兴你愿意回电

translation.en: Yeah, sure. What's up, Kate?
translation.zh: 你找我有什么事吗？

translation.en: [Kate] When you found me and Jack at that taco place,
translation.zh: 你上回在墨西哥卷饼餐厅找到我和杰克

translation.en: how did you know where he'd be?
translation.zh: 你是怎么得到消息的？

translation.en: He sent out a press release.
translation.zh: 他发布了一个新闻稿

translation.en: A press release?
translation.zh: 新闻稿？

translation.en: Yeah. Or his publicist put it out.
translation.zh: 没错 是他的公关人员发布的

translation.en: Carl... Carl Green at, uh...
translation.zh: 他叫卡尔格林

translation.en: PDD. PDD?
translation.zh: -来自“PDD”-“PDD”？

translation.en: [Stephanie] Yeah, Parker Dunlop Development.
translation.zh: 没错 他来自派克丹洛普公关公司

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 我知道了

translation.en: Okay, thanks, Steph. I owe you one.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 史蒂芬妮 我欠你一个人情

translation.en: What's going on? -PDD is Parker Dunlop Development. -Oh.
translation.zh: -怎么了？-“PDD”是派克丹洛普公关公司

translation.en: -What? -It's a political consulting agency.
translation.zh: 一个专门服务高级客户的政治公关公司

translation.en: -Very high-end. -They groom candidates for public office.
translation.zh: 一个专门服务高级客户的政治公关公司 那家公司专门为国会候选人打造形象

translation.en: Uh, campaigns, policy, media coaching.
translation.zh: 设计宣传活动和提供公关课

translation.en: Yeah. My dad used them in the last election.
translation.zh: 没错 我爸上一回参选时也是跟他们合作

translation.en: But why would they get paid in cash?
translation.zh: 但他为什么要支付现金呢？

translation.en: Oh, Lauren.
translation.zh: 天啊 劳伦

translation.en: You have so much to learn about DC.
translation.zh: 看来华盛顿的事 你还得多多学习呢

translation.en: Okay, hold on. When was the second $400,000 withdrawal?
translation.zh: 等一下 第二笔四十万美元是什么时候取出的？

translation.en: October 27th.
[Kate] Right.
translation.zh: 果然不出我所料

translation.en: The day after Jack and I had dinner and talked about Good Sam.
translation.zh: 正是我和杰克共进晚餐聊到好撒马利亚人后的第二天

translation.en: So if Jack's first 400,000 was spent on political consulting instead--
translation.zh: 如果杰克的第一笔四十万美元是用来支付竞选公关费的

translation.en: Then who was behind the money in the first four bags?
translation.zh: 那谁才是送出前四个袋子的人？

translation.en: Where are you going?
translation.zh: 你去哪里？

translation.en: When were you gonna tell me that you weren't Good Sam?
translation.zh: 你什么时候才肯承认你不是“好撒马利亚人”？

translation.en: I'm gonna call you back.
translation.zh: 我待会儿再打给你

translation.en: What are you talking about? Of course I'm Good Sam.
translation.zh: 你在说什么？我就是“好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: But you didn't tell me the whole story, now, did you, Jack?
translation.zh: 杰克 你没把所有真相告诉我 对吧？

translation.en: The first $400,000 you spent on campaign expenses?
translation.zh: 第一笔四十万美元是竞选经费？

translation.en: PDD?
translation.zh: “PDD”

translation.en: Why don't you tell me the truth, Jack? And tell me like it really happened.
translation.zh: 杰克 你为什么不把真相告诉我？告诉我到底是怎么回事

translation.en: I did give away the last 400,000.
translation.zh: 后面的四十万美元确实是我送出的

translation.en: And the rest?
translation.zh: 其余的四十万呢？

translation.en: Somebody else gave that away. I don't know who.
translation.zh: 是其他人送的 我不知道是谁

translation.en: And you just took credit for it?
translation.zh: 而你却占他的光？

translation.en: Look...
translation.zh: 你听我说

translation.en: Um, I'd never seen anything like the media attention the guy was getting.
translation.zh: 我从来不曾见过有人像他这样深受媒体关注

translation.en: Everywhere I went, people were talking about Good Sam. Even you.
translation.zh: 我所到之处 每个人都在谈论他就连你也一样

translation.en: And I know how important it is for you to find someone doing good.
translation.zh: 我知道你需要找一个做好事的人

translation.en: I'm that guy.
translation.zh: 而我就是那个人

translation.en: I wasn't just looking for someone doing good, Jack.
translation.zh: 杰克 我要找的不仅是做好事的人

translation.en: I was looking for someone doing good who didn't expect anything in return,
translation.zh: 而是做好事不求回报的人

translation.en: and that is not you.
translation.zh: 那个人不是你

translation.en: I might not be the guy who started this whole thing, but...
translation.zh: 虽然这个善举不是从我开始的 不过…

translation.en: I did.
translation.zh: 我的确…

translation.en: I gave away $400,000. That's got to count for something.
translation.zh: 我的确送出了四十万美元至少能证明什么吧

translation.en: You gave money away for publicity so that you could run for Congress.
translation.zh: 你送钱是为了博取宣传让你可以竞选国会议员

translation.en: Kate, we're both getting a lot of mileage out of this story.
translation.zh: 凯特 从这个报道中我们两人都得到了很多好处

translation.en: That's what this is about? Mileage?
translation.zh: 这就是一切？好处？

translation.en: You lied, Jack.
translation.zh: 杰克 你撒谎

translation.en: So, what, the truth doesn't matter as long as you get what you want. Is that it?
translation.zh: 真相不重要 只求能达到目的 对吧？

translation.en: Okay, how-- how-- how can I fix this... with you?
translation.zh: 我懂了 你要我怎么做才肯原谅我？

translation.en: Would it make a difference if I gave away another $400,000?
translation.zh: 假如我再送出四十万美元你会改变对我的看法吗？

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Where does the truth end and the lie begin?
translation.zh: 真相的尽头在哪里？谎言又是从何开始？

translation.en: Hold on. Let's talk about this.
translation.zh: 别走 我们好好谈谈

translation.en: Kate!
translation.zh: 凯特

translation.en: Kate...
translation.zh: 凯特

translation.en: What? Say that again.
translation.zh: 什么？再说一遍

translation.en: [Kate] I said Jack Hansen isn't Good Sam.
translation.zh: 我说杰克汉森不是“好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: This is the kind of thing that ruins a station's reputation and kills careers.
translation.zh: 这种事足以摧毁电视台和记者的专业声誉

translation.en: -Yours and mine. -David, let her talk.
translation.zh: -包括你和我-大卫 听她说完

translation.en: He lied to me. He just admitted that he's a copycat.
translation.zh: 他骗我 他刚承认了 他只是有样学样

translation.en: After the real Good Sam gave away $400,000,
translation.zh: “好撒马利亚人”送出四十万美元后

translation.en: -Jack stepped in and did the same thing. -Great.
translation.zh: -杰克如法泡制-很好

translation.en: He's been working with a DC press agent for months. We got played.
translation.zh: 过去几个月以来他一直跟一家华盛顿的公关公司合作 我们被耍了

translation.en: Okay, so if Jack Hansen isn't Good Sam, then who is?
translation.zh: 杰克汉森不是“好撒马利亚人”那谁才是呢？

translation.en: Well, maybe the real Good Sam's in hiding, you know, to protect his identity.
translation.zh: 真正的“好撒马利亚人”为了隐藏身份可能还在躲起来

translation.en: Maybe he's got his own agenda. A marketing ploy.
translation.zh: 可能有自己的目的搞不好是营销噱头

translation.en: There's always the criminal angle. The money's some kinda repayment?
translation.zh: 也可以从犯罪的角度理解或许是赃款

translation.en: Guys, I don't think the real Good Sam is doing this for anything.
translation.zh: 我倒认为真正的“好撒马利亚人”送钱不是为了什么

translation.en: Oh, come on.
translation.zh: 少来了

translation.en: No, I'm serious.
translation.zh: 我是认真的

translation.en: Look, when I first got put on the story,
translation.zh: 你们听我说 我开始接下这个报道时

translation.en: I was sure Good Sam had some ulterior motive.
translation.zh: 也很肯定这位“好撒马利亚人”另有心机

translation.en: I've been working the bummer beat for years...
translation.zh: 这些年来 我都在报道天灾人祸

translation.en: and we know it always gets the ratings.
translation.zh: 这些新闻都是收视率的保证

translation.en: But we choose to show the selfish, violent things people do every day,
translation.zh: 我们选择体现人们自私、暴力的一面

translation.en: when we know that there are way more people out there doing good.
translation.zh: 但我们都很清楚外头有许多人在做好事

translation.en: Oh, that's a real nice sentiment, Kate. I'm getting all choked up here.
translation.zh: 凯特 说得真令人动容我感动得快哭了

translation.en: But that doesn't tell us who the real Good Sam is.
translation.zh: 但我们依然不知道“好撒马利亚人”是谁

translation.en: -Come on, people. Have we got any ideas? -Not yet.
translation.zh: -快想想 有谁想得出来？-暂时想不到

translation.en: But we've gotta go back to the first four money drops.
translation.zh: 但我们必须回去追查前四袋现金的受益人

translation.en: Christina, Marie, Jesse, and Faith.
translation.zh: 克里斯蒂娜、玛丽、杰西和菲丝

translation.en: -Find out what they have in common. -[David] Let me think.
translation.zh: 了解他们拥有哪些共同点 让我想想

translation.en: Where do they all live?
translation.zh: 他们都住在哪里？

translation.en: All over. Bronx, Brooklyn, Manhattan, Staten Island.
translation.zh: 各个角落 布朗克斯布鲁克林、曼哈顿和史丹顿岛

translation.en: All right, so that's not it. What about schools, clubs, associations?
translation.zh: 地点不是重点 查查他们就读的学校所参加的俱乐部和组织

translation.en: -Anything in common? -No, nothing. We checked.
translation.zh: -有哪些共同点？-没有 都查过了

translation.en: -All born in New York? -Marie was born in Brooklyn.
translation.zh: -都在纽约出生吗？-玛丽在布鲁克林出生

translation.en: -Faith was born here, too. -[Lauren] No. No go.
translation.zh: -菲丝也是这里出生的人-不是 继续查

translation.en: Christina was born in Mexico and Jesse's from Maine, Camden Harbor.
translation.zh: 克里斯蒂娜在墨西哥出生杰西出生于缅因州的卡姆登港

translation.en: [Kate] Sorry, what?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: Oh, Camden Harbor on the coast of Maine.
translation.zh: 缅因州的卡姆登港

translation.en: Camden Harbor...
translation.zh: 卡姆登港？

translation.en: Okay, I-I, uh-- I have a hunch. I'll call you back.
translation.zh: 我有某种预感 待会儿再打给你

translation.en: No, no, no, wait, wait. Where are you? I'll send a news van.
translation.zh: 等一下 你在哪里？我马上派一辆新闻车过去

translation.en: You can't shoot a hunch, David. Give me some time.
translation.zh: 大卫 “预感”是拍不到的给我一点时间

translation.en: [David] No, Kate, wait. Just--
translation.zh: 凯特 等一下 你…

translation.en: Taxi.
translation.zh: 出租车

translation.en: Do you think this could be the--
translation.zh: 你认为这有没有可能是…

translation.en: I-I hurt my back a while ago.
translation.zh: 前阵子我的背部受伤了

translation.en: Wait here, please.
translation.zh: 请你等一下

translation.en: Hey, Jesse. Uh, you got a couple of minutes to talk about Good Sam?
translation.zh: 杰西 你有时间谈谈有关“好撒马利亚人”的事吗？

translation.en: I'm running behind.
translation.zh: 我在赶时间

translation.en: Well, I saw a photo of someone who looked like you
translation.zh: 我看过一张照片 照片中的人很像你

translation.en: on a sailboat with Patrick and Eric Hayes.
translation.zh: 照片中的帆船上还有帕特里克和艾瑞克赫士

translation.en: Sailing with the Hayes boys.
translation.zh: 你是说跟赫士兄弟扬帆出海

translation.en: It's probably me then, yeah. So you knew them?
translation.zh: -没错 很有可能是我-你认识他们？

translation.en: I was practically a member of the family.
translation.zh: 我算是他们的家人了

translation.en: Patrick was my best friend since fourth grade.
translation.zh: 我和帕特里克从四年级起就成了好朋友

translation.en: I did, uh, all the woodwork on his boat. You know, the Crazy Eight.
translation.zh: 他帆船的木工都由我负责那艘船叫“8号疯子”

translation.en: I'm sorry, you said the Crazy Eight?
translation.zh: 慢着 “8号疯子”？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对啊

translation.en: Yeah, the accident really wrecked all of us.
translation.zh: 那场意外几乎毁了我们的人生

translation.en: Eric more than anyone else, but... Are you doing a story about a sailboat?
translation.zh: 尤其是艾瑞克你打算做帆船的报道吗？

translation.en: Yeah, in a way, I might be.
translation.zh: 可以这么说吧

translation.en: Hi, it's Kate from Channel 12 News. I have a question for you.
translation.zh: 你好 我是来自第12新闻频道的凯特我想问你一个问题

translation.en: Did you know Patrick Hayes?
translation.zh: 你认识派特里克赫士吗？

translation.en: [woman] Yeah. I, uh, worked with Patrick at Inniswell Properties.
translation.zh: 没错 我以前是帕特里克的公司恩尼斯威尔房地产的职员

translation.en: First job as a paralegal. He was great at the business part,
translation.zh: 那是我第一份担任律师助理的工作他很有生意头脑

translation.en: but, uh, he had dyslexia, so reading wasn't easy for him.
translation.zh: 可惜患有阅读障碍 看字方面有困难

translation.en: I helped him with research, contracts...
translation.zh: 我帮他做研究、分析合约

translation.en: I was Patrick and Eric's babysitter.
translation.zh: 我是帕特里克和艾瑞克的保姆

translation.en: I started when they were little kids,
translation.zh: 他们小时候就交给我照顾了

translation.en: and then they grew up right in front of my eyes.
translation.zh: 我是看着他们长大的

translation.en: Yes. Patrick Hayes was my patient several years ago.
translation.zh: 几年前帕特里克赫士是我的病人

translation.en: I can't discuss specifics, but I can say he made a remarkable recovery.
translation.zh: 恕我不能透露详情我只能说他恢复得非常好

translation.en: He was always so grateful.
translation.zh: 生前是个懂得感恩的人

translation.en: But I just did what doctors do.
translation.zh: 我只是履行医生的职务

translation.en: But, um...
translation.zh: 可是…

translation.en: Patrick can't be your Good Sam...
translation.zh: 帕特里克不可能是“好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: because he died... months ago.
translation.zh: 因为他几个月前过世了

translation.en: -Hey. -[Kate] Hi.
translation.zh: -嗨-嗨

translation.en: -Uh, come on in. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -进来吧-谢谢

translation.en: -Uh, let me grab your things. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -我帮你把东西放好-谢谢

translation.en: Christina Gomez was your babysitter when you and Patrick were little.
translation.zh: 克里斯蒂娜戈麦斯你和帕特里克小时候的保姆

translation.en: Faith Haywood's first job was at your brother's company.
translation.zh: 菲丝海伍德的第一份工作是在你哥的公司上班

translation.en: Dr. Ellis was Patrick's doctor when he was sick.
translation.zh: 帕特里克生病时埃利斯是他的主治医生

translation.en: And Jesse Durham was his best friend.
translation.zh: 杰西杜尔汉是他生前的好朋友

translation.en: He used to go sailing with you guys all the time on the Crazy Eight.
translation.zh: 他以前经常跟你们一起乘着“8号疯子”出海

translation.en: You're Good Sam, aren't you?
translation.zh: 你就是“好撒马利亚人”吧？

translation.en: Come on in. Let's talk.
translation.zh: 我们进去说吧

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: So... where did you get all this money to give away?
translation.zh: 那些钱是从哪来的？

translation.en: My brother's boat was destroyed in the accident.
translation.zh: 我哥的帆船被风浪摧毁了

translation.en: And, uh... I got an insurance check...
translation.zh: 事后我收到保险金

translation.en: for over 400 grand.
translation.zh: 四十多万美元

translation.en: I told them that it wasn't my boat, but...
translation.zh: 我说那艘船不是我的

translation.en: as it turns out, Patrick transferred the ownership to me.
translation.zh: 结果我发现帕特里克已经把船过户给我了

translation.en: Apparently, that was my surprise.
translation.zh: 原来那艘船就是我的生日惊喜

translation.en: He was giving me the Crazy Eight for my birthday.
translation.zh: 他打算把船当作生日礼物送给我

translation.en: But I failed him.
translation.zh: 但是我让他失望了

translation.en: So I couldn't keep the money.
translation.zh: 所以我不能收下那笔钱

translation.en: So that's why you gave it all away.
translation.zh: 这就是你把送钱给他人的原因

translation.en: There are these friends of his... who really made his life better.
translation.zh: 在他的人生中曾经有许多朋友以不同的方式

translation.en: You know, in different ways.
translation.zh: 让他过得更快乐

translation.en: I just thought... they deserved it more than me.
translation.zh: 我觉得他们比我更配得到这笔钱

translation.en: But why not just give the money to them directly?
translation.zh: 为什么不直接把钱交到他们手上？

translation.en: I thought they'd enjoy it more and... do what they needed with it
translation.zh: 我只是觉得如果他们不知道赠主的身份

translation.en: if they weren't weighed down by where it came from.
translation.zh: 比较能心安理得地把钱用在需要的地方

translation.en: I'm really sorry about your brother.
translation.zh: 我为你哥感到非常难过

translation.en: But I think he'd be so proud of what you've done here.
translation.zh: 但我相信他肯定会为你所做的事情感到骄傲的

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: But I cannot be your story.
translation.zh: 我不能成为你的新闻

translation.en: It's not about a story.
translation.zh: 最重要的不是要做新闻

translation.en: Not anymore.
translation.zh: 不是了

translation.en: Channel 12 News has learned
translation.zh: 第12新闻频道发现

translation.en: that Jack Hansen is not the Good Samaritan he claimed to be.
translation.zh: 杰克汉森并不是他口中的“好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: While Jack Hansen did give away the last $400,000,
translation.zh: 他只送出最后四袋总值四十万美元的现金

translation.en: he was not behind the first four gifts.
translation.zh: 前四袋现金并非出自他手

translation.en: Rather, he copied the original Good Sam
translation.zh: 他只是有样学样模仿“好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: in order to promote his own political ambitions.
translation.zh: 以满足其政治野心 达到宣传目的

translation.en: So who is the real Good Sam?
translation.zh: 谁才是真正的“好撒马利亚人”呢？

translation.en: Unlike Hansen, he seeks no attention.
translation.zh: 这个人不像汉森 他不求回报

translation.en: Instead, he's asked to remain anonymous, expecting nothing in return.
translation.zh: 他希望能继续隐姓埋名 更不求回报

translation.en: And a remarkable thing has happened.
translation.zh: 激励人心的事发生了

translation.en: The recipients of Good Sam's generosity became Good Sams themselves.
translation.zh: “好撒马利亚人”的受益人纷纷成了另一个“好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: One gave a car to her neighbor.
translation.zh: 其中一名受益人送车给邻居

translation.en: One, a substantial donation to a local food bank.
translation.zh: 另一名受益人捐出大笔款项给当地的粮食银行

translation.en: Another started a scholarship for paralegals hoping to become lawyers.
translation.zh: 另一名受益人建立了一项奖学金项目帮助律师助理成为律师

translation.en: The recipient in Brooklyn gave all the money to cancer research.
translation.zh: 另一名来自布鲁克林区的受益人则把钱捐给癌症研究机构

translation.en: What Good Sam never expected
translation.zh: “好撒马利亚人”肯定没想到

translation.en: was that we would be inspired by his example.
translation.zh: 他的善举能激发我们的善心

translation.en: Some people say New York City is a tough place.
translation.zh: 有人说 纽约市人情淡薄

translation.en: A place where everyone's out for themselves.
translation.zh: 各人自扫门前雪

translation.en: But as I look across our city,
translation.zh: 可是当我俯瞰这座城市

translation.en: I see more kindness between strangers than competition.
translation.zh: 我发现人与人之间的善良比竞争来得多

translation.en: I see people reaching out to help others...
translation.zh: 我看见人们互相帮助

translation.en: on street corners, subway platforms, and in apartment hallways.
translation.zh: 街头巷尾、地铁站台、公寓走廊温暖无处不在

translation.en: Thanks to Good Sam,
translation.zh: 谢谢你 “好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: we're becoming better versions of ourselves.
translation.zh: 因为你 我们成为了更好的自己

translation.en: Kate Bradley, Channel 12 News.
translation.zh: 我是记者凯特布莱德利这是第12新闻频道

translation.en: -Good work. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -好样的-谢谢

translation.en: -Beautiful reporting, Kate. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -凯特 报道很感人-谢谢

translation.en: [Kate] Bye, guys.
translation.zh: 再见了

translation.en: Hey, Dad. I saw your report on Jack Hansen.
translation.zh: -爸 是我-我看见你针对杰克汉森做的报道

translation.en: You were right about him all along.
translation.zh: 你说得没错

translation.en: I should have trusted your instincts.
translation.zh: 我应该相信你的直觉才对

translation.en: That's okay. I appreciate that, Dad.
translation.zh: 爸 没关系 多谢你的信任

translation.en: Whoever the real Good Sam is,
translation.zh: 无论那个“好撒马利亚人”是谁

translation.en: a man like that makes us see the world... differently.
translation.zh: 这个人的确改变了我们对世界的看法

translation.en: You haven't met him, but I think you'd really like him.
translation.zh: 你没见过他不过我也相信你会喜欢上这个人

translation.en: Anyone that makes you happy is all right by me.
translation.zh: 任何能让你开心的人 我都喜欢

translation.en: Thanks, Dad.
translation.zh: 爸 谢谢你

translation.en: -Night, Katie. -Okay, good night. Love you.
translation.zh: 晚安 凯特 晚安 爱你

translation.en: -[Kate laughs] I was not flirting. -[Eric laughs]
translation.zh: 我没在抛媚眼

translation.en: -[Eric] Really? Not even a little? -[Kate] Okay, maybe a little.
translation.zh: 你确定吗？完全没有？ 好吧 有点那个意思

translation.en: -So I brought a little surprise for you. -Oh.
translation.zh: -我为你准备了一个惊喜-天啊

translation.en: -Close your eyes. -Okay.
translation.zh: -闭上眼睛-好的

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 行了

translation.en: Open.
translation.zh: 睁开眼睛

translation.en: [Kate gasps] Cool.
translation.zh: 好漂亮

translation.en: Are we going stargazing?
translation.zh: 你要带我去观星吗？

translation.en: Not quite.
translation.zh: 不完全正确

translation.en: It's a clue for where I'm gonna take you tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我打算明天带你去一个地方这是线索

translation.en: Hayden Planetarium?
translation.zh: 海登天文馆？

translation.en: The North Pole?
translation.zh: 北极？

translation.en: A pirate-themed party?
translation.zh: 海盗主题派对？

translation.en: That's actually closer. It's on the water.
translation.zh: 很接近了 跟水有关

translation.en: The Brooklyn Bridge?
translation.zh: 布鲁克林大桥？

translation.en: Are you asking me to go sailing?
translation.zh: 你想带我扬帆出海？

translation.en: Yeah, I am.
translation.zh: 没错 猜对了

translation.en: And look at that. For once, it's me asking you questions.
translation.zh: 你看 轮到我问你问题了吧

translation.en: [woman] Uh, hello?
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: I think you've got a fan.
translation.zh: 好像是你的粉丝

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: -你好-抱歉 请问你是凯特布莱德利吗？

translation.en: -Excuse me, are you Kate Bradley? -[Kate] Yeah.
translation.zh: -你好-抱歉 请问你是凯特布莱德利吗？ -没错-你是第12新闻频道的记者？

translation.en: -From Channel 12? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -没错-你是第12新闻频道的记者？

translation.en: I was wondering if you would, uh, thank Good Sam for me.
translation.zh: 我在想你能不能帮我向“好撒马利亚人”道谢

translation.en: Sure, but what for?
translation.zh: 好啊 为什么？

translation.en: I just received a scholarship to go to college.
translation.zh: 我刚获得了一份大学奖学金

translation.en: The school didn't know where it came from,
translation.zh: 连校方也查不出捐赠者是谁

translation.en: but I thought for sure it was from Good Sam.
translation.zh: 我相信肯定是你报道的那位“好撒马利亚人”

translation.en: Um... a full scholarship?
translation.zh: 全额奖学金？

translation.en: All four years. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 对 四年全额奖学金

translation.en: Other kids in my graduating class got them as well, plus kids in other schools.
translation.zh: 其他同班同学和其他学校的学生也都获得了奖学金

translation.en: We all received one of these.
translation.zh: 受益人都收到这个徽章

translation.en: Do you think it's from Good Sam? I don't know. I'd have to ask him.
translation.zh: -你认为是“好撒马利亚人”吗？-我也不清楚 我得问问他

translation.en: Oh, I gotta run, but if it is Good Sam behind all of this...
translation.zh: 我该走了 如果真的是他做的

translation.en: [exhales] ...thank him for me.
translation.zh: 请你代我向他道谢

translation.en: Sure. Yeah, definitely.
translation.zh: 好的 没问题

translation.en: Do you know anything about this?
translation.zh: 你听说过吗？

translation.en: It wasn't me.
translation.zh: 不是我做的

translation.en: Um... I'm doing my good deeds right here.
translation.zh: 我正坐在这里做好事呢

translation.en: -And tomorrow, when I take you sailing. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -明天 我就带你扬帆出海-好啊

translation.en: So wait. Really, you had nothing to do with that?
translation.zh: 慢着 这件事真的跟你无关？

translation.en: [laughs] I swear.
translation.zh: 我发誓

translation.en: You really want to chase that story, don't you?
translation.zh: 你很想去追踪那个故事 对吧？

translation.en: Kind of.
translation.zh: 有点
